name: Wa Wabbit Essence
description: This essence contains a part of the immense power of a dungeon keeper: the pick of the litter of monsters in the World of Twelve. Now you just have to find a use befitting such power.

name: Brumen's Map
description: This map will allow you to find Brumen's legendary treasure.

name: Oak Sap
description: Sap has numerous uses, but lumberjacks have always preferred using it to make Yule Logs.

name: Tam Voodoo Doll
description: This Doll has a mysterious power, and you have a sneaking suspicion that there’s someone trapped inside it.

name: Mawabouwaino Chip
description: A piece so intense that Waddicts claim it exceeds 200% cocoa. But can you ever really trust a Waddict?

name: Waddict Foundry Key
description: Take a peek behind the scenes in the Fleaster chocolate factory with this key.

name: Hop
description: The flower of the female Hop plant contains all of the active ingredients used in brewing, such as bitter resins and essential oils. The flower of the male Hop plant isn't useful for anything, other than scattering pollen all over the place.

name: Magnesite
description: This eccentric alloy is almost magical; it glitters and vibrates at night time, which is enough to frighten a slightly gullible Bwork.

name: Peawly Mowning Key Fragment
description: An old Lenald key recycled by the Wabbits. This has passed through so many paws over the years, it'd be a shame to break it now!

name: Ediem Carp
description: This creature is considered the wisest of all the freshwater fish. It's also surprisingly easy to catch... it's supreme knowledge of all things plunges many of its kind into an mind-numbing depression.

name: Royal Lemon Jelly
description: Some people say that Royal Lemon Jelly is much tastier than all the others, but that could be because the lemon flavour hides the taste of the jelly.

name: Archer Voodoo Doll
description: Strength emanates from this doll… you have the strange feeling that it is waiting for somebody.

name: Drinker Feather
description: This alcohol-soaked feather is extremely inflammable. It's very useful for roasting Drinkers.

name: Wa Wabbit Hair
description: The Wa Wabbit is usually quite miserly and balks at sharing his hair. Exceptionally, to reward your courage (or buy your clemency), he has decided to give you one of his body parts. How touching!

name: Grossewer Rat Hair
description: This hair is dirty and stinky. It roamed the most disgusting sewers of the area. And yet, it's still shiny.

name: Blop Field Key
description: This key grants you access to the Blop Field.

name: Greedoblop Flower
description: Gluttonous Greedoblops get so hungry that they'll even consider eating their own flowers. Fortunately, their snappy jaws always seem to stumble upon a wandering adventurer just in time.

name: Royal Morello Cherry Blop Flower
description: If this flower wasn't royal, I bet you would have thrown it out by now.

name: Pa Loc Rune
description: You're finding it difficult to throw this very sticky rune away. It's magical properties will allow you to keep in contact with your enemies.

name: Fragment of Brumen's Map 1/3
description: The crafters don't yet know enough about this item for its characteristics to be revealed to potential buyers.

name: Fragment of Brumen's Map 3/3
description: The crafters don't yet know enough about this item for its characteristics to be revealed to potential buyers.

name: Surf Board
description: Many copies of this Vulkanian board were created in Amakna.

name: Minor New Leaf Orb
description: This orb lets you reset an item’s characteristics if you use it during a Smithmagic session.

name: Loc Tra Pa Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one much more clingy.

name: Cobalt
description: The name "Cobalt" means "Devil's Copper" in ancient Sadida. It's suited to the forging of light and stylish - but lethal - weapons.

name: Oak Wood
description: This high-quality wood is particularly resistant. It's ideal for making things like bludgeons, houses or even boats. But its most vital use is for beer barrels.

name: Thierry Voodoo Doll
description: Strength emanates from this doll… you have the strange feeling that it is calling somebody.

name: Sarbak Voodoo Doll
description: Strength emanates from this doll... you have the strange feeling that it is listening to somebody.

name: Royal Coco Blop Flower
description: If this flower wasn't royal, I bet you would have thrown it out by now.

name: Royal Pippin Blop Flower
description: If this flower wasn't royal, I bet you would have thrown it out by now.

name: Pa Dod Rune
description: You're finding it difficult to keep hold of this very slippery rune. When used correctly, it'll help you get out of difficult situations.

name: Kanniball Village Key
description: An ancient custom is to offer a certain lose-lose proposition to everyone who visits the Kanniball village: death or tounga. Sadly, the extremely painful tradition wasted far too many Kokonuts, so it was replaced by a simple key. It was a lot funnier before.

name: Royal Blop Essence
description: This essence contains a part of the immense power of a dungeon keeper: the pick of the litter of monsters in the World of Twelve. Now you just have to find a use befitting such power.

name: Brumen's Elixir
description: The source of all Brumen Tinctorias's might can be found in these elixirs, which give his power and intelligence a megaboost. Take good care of them; they could come in handy sooner than you expect…

name: Do Ko Pa Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one much less brave.

name: Loc Ko Pa Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one much more clingy.

name: Waddict Bar
description: This bar is a basic component in the Mawabouwaino set.

name: High Noon Key Fragment
description: This key hasn't been nibbled to pieces yet. Use it well.

name: Lemon Jelly
description: This pot of Lemon Jelly looks quite strange. According to Elrik Ola, this jelly comes from his place. From the other side of the galaxy, to be more precise. It's a pity it tastes so good!

name: Aquamarine Stone
description: This stone is usually found around Pandala Island. Pandawas are convinced it has special powers. Just like the rumours about Iops and their hidden intelligence, no one has proven this myth.

name: Royal Indigo Blop Flower
description: If this flower wasn't royal, I bet you would have thrown it out by now.

name: Kanniball Andchain's Hood
description: Not many people know that Kanniball Andchain wears a hood under his mask. Now that you have it in your hands, you'll be able to prove it. The question is, will people believe you?

name: Kwakwa Feather
description: There's an old Osa nursery rhyme that tells of a Kwakwa with a khaki feather stuck to its kwokkwok. Unfortunately, the words don't mention what a kwokkwok is, nor where you can find such a thing.

name: Wa Wabbit's Castle Key
description: The crafters don't yet know enough about this item for its characteristics to be revealed to potential buyers.

name: Royal Jelly Essence
description: This essence contains a part of the immense power of a dungeon keeper: the pick of the litter of monsters in the World of Twelve. Now you just have to find a use befitting such power.

name: Kanniball Andchain Essence
description: This essence contains a part of the immense power of a dungeon keeper: the pick of the litter of monsters in the World of Twelve. Now you just have to find a use befitting such power.

name: Fragment of Brumen's Map 2/3
description: The crafters don't yet know enough about this item for its characteristics to be revealed to potential buyers.

name: Praying Mint
description: It's said that this board is very pious, even though it's often used by young Srams to strangle their husbands after the honeymoon.

name: Maggoty Meat
description: This still-living meat doesn't mill about as much as one might expect. In fact, the larvae are waiting to be eaten to start developing.

name: Maggoty Carrion
description: If you slapped a hunk of this raw meat on a plate, it’d crawl to the nearest mouth.

name: Do Tra Pa Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one much less courageous.

name: Wolling Evening Key Fragment
description: This key is already quite nibbled, but you've got the most important part of it. Here's hoping you don't get peckish too!

name: Bright Hop
description: This type of hop has a bright and subdued aura revealing the magic Mother Nature has endowed it with.

name: Royal Mint Jelly
description: This Royal Jelly strikes fear into the hearts of all but the craziest warriors. Be careful not to eat it… it's no plain Mint Jelly.

name: Royal Strawberry Jelly
description: This concentrate of Royal Strawberry Jelly can turn a pacifist Tabi into a bloodthirsty killing-machine. An excellent reason to avoid giving it to your friends as a starter.

name: Jav Voodoo Doll
description: Strength emanates from this doll... you have the strange feeling that it is looking for somebody.

name: Cherry Plank
description: A handyman could use this plank to make something delightful - a coffin, for example. Just bear that in mind.

name: Carniflora
description: This beautiful flower reflects the sensitivity of its former owner. Who'd have thought that even the most ferocious of Kanniballs had a soft side!

name: Kwakwa Beak
description: The Kwakwa is proud and majestic, but everyone knows that its beak stinks. Everyone apart from you, it seems. Maybe you should have thought a little harder before picking it up.

name: Muta
description: Keep your friends close and your enemies closer.

name: Strawberry
description: Strawberries are the Strawberry Jelly's staple food. If you smell these delicious red berries somewhere, don't get too excited - it's likely that you've simply stumbled into a Strawberry Jelly's hunting ground.

name: Strawberry Jelly
description: Many greedy adventurers were dreadfully sick because of this delicious jelly. There's a saying that goes "everything is poison, nothing is poison, it's the dose that matters". In the case of Strawberry Jelly, avoid overdosing.

name: Citronana
description: Flambéed or sliced, topped with melted chocolate or just on its own, this fruit is a delicious dessert.

name: Domo
description: Generally speaking, spreading out is a horrible tactic. It's almost as bad as sticking together.

name: Beaztinga Wings
description: This wing continues to vibrate frenetically, despite the fact that it's been violently detached from its former owner. It's funny at first, but it becomes a bit annoying when you've got lots of them in your sack.

name: Beaztinga Fuzz
description: In adolescence, the Beaztinga's body gets covered by a soft fuzz, which is paradoxical next to the overly aggressive behavior it adopts during that period.

name: Plisskenskin
description: Have you ever dreamt of a magnificent Plissken leather bag? No? Good on you! It's not that resistant anyway!

name: Damaged Shell
description: This shell is the last remnant of Pushy Robot that pushed the limits a little too far.

name: Hyoactive Rat Tail
description: Carefully cut, this tail tastes like a sausage. The weird thing is, when you cut out big slices, the sausage taste disappears. Another existential culinary enigma in this world.

name: Double Swell Warrior Ear
description: Hold it to your ear and you might hear the sea.

name: Bell
description: The Green Mouse can be heard for kilokametres around thanks to its bell. And fortunately so, because it isn't easily visible in the luxuriant vegetation of the Cania Plains.

name: Blopshroom Pollen
description: Blop pollen causes all mild allergies in the World. What is more worrying is that all lethal allergies begin with mild allergies. In short, don't keep this pollen in your pockets if you don't need it.

name: Minor Sak
description: Whatever doesn't eat you makes you stronger.

name: Mint Jelly
description: Many greedy adventurers were dreadfully sick because of this delicious Mint Jelly. Eaten in moderation, to ease your bad breath for example, it will have soothing properties on the morale of your troops.

name: Wo Wabbit Stomach
description: The main feature of this stomach is that it can easily distend. This greatly simplifies the Wo Wabbit's digestive problems caused by its excessive drinking of fermented Cawwot liquor.

name: Wo Wabbit Hair
description: This kind of hair is so greasy that you can use it to make waterproof clothes.

name: Equipped Chest's Dentures
description: Found in the bottom of a chest, these dentures have no use to the Imps. For you though, they'll have a use.

name: Plissken Venom
description: This dreadful venom can wipe out a whole army of furious Gobballs. Just pour some of it onto a staff and start a-swipin'!

name: Greedoblop Petal
description: As strange as it may seem, Blop Petals are not edible, neither cooked nor raw.

name: Strange Ore
description: This ore has been extracted from a mysterious and unknown quarry. Unlike most strange items, it doesn't have an ounce of magic in it.

name: Green Mouse
description: A Green Mouse running across the plains? Whatever you do, don't grab its tail.

name: Robionicle Claw
description: This primitive-looking claw is primarily used to rip the heads off enemy Robionicles during the illegal robot fights the Imps organise.

name: Rat Skin
description: The scars all over this skin are actual proof of the Rat's difficult childhood. You could at least feel sorry for him!

name: Gwandpa Wabbit Beard Hair
description: Gwandpa Wabbits have foul-smelling false beards, just like Father Kwismas, but worse. As they are constantly dribbling in front of the Gwandma Wabbits, their beard hair is imbued with the underestimated powers of their dribble.

name: Gwandpa Wabbit Ear
description: These ears are pointed, rigid and covered with beautiful striped fur. It's unquestionably some exquisite fur, mainly because it's odourless.

name: Plains Larva Skin
description: This skin smells like the countryside as well as being rather pretty. Some would even say it represents the authenticity of the Cania Fields soil.

name: Leather Drive Belt
description: These belts, created for use in automatons, are frequently misused by Imps during their nocturnal meetings.

name: Robo Mace's Mace
description: Seeing the size of this mace, you have to wonder what the Imps really play at with their robots.

name: Robo Mace's Chain
description: Don't underestimate the ruggedness of this chain. The slightest hit on your backside will keep you from sitting down for days.

name: Broken Hinge
description: The wear and tear caused by the constant opening and closing of the chest's lid have finally worn out the poor security hinge. It must have been very painful.

name: Gleaming Rat Snout
description: This rat has an exceptionally good snout. Not as good as the Ouginak's, but even so, it can smell predators within a radius of 300 kametres. Very convenient for avoiding predators.

name: Plains Larva Tooth
description: There's no doubt this tooth used to belong to a Plains Larvae. It's plain to see from its dangerously sharp tip.

name: Magic Bluish Dye
description: This small magic potion gives hair a magnificent bluish effect. Oh, and it seems to have a few magical powers.

name: Dod Rune
description: You're finding it difficult to keep hold of this slippery rune. When used correctly, it'll help you get out of difficult situations.

name: Loc Ko Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one a bit more clingy.

name: Do Tra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one a bit less courageous.

name: Yosh
description: …then I took an arrow to the heart.

name: Loc Rune
description: You're finding it difficult to throw this sticky rune away. It's magical properties will allow you to keep in contact with your enemies.

name: Do Ko Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one a bit less brave.

name: Loc Tra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one a bit more clingy.

name: Magic Redness Dye
description: This small magic potion gives hair a magnificent red colour. Oh, and it seems to have a few magical powers.

name: Wunkie Tendon
description: A tendon so tender it tends to tendinitis but is loved by tendentious tenderfoots with a fondness for tendrils.

name: Bluish Jelly
description: This jelly is especially sticky, like an enraged Sadida Block. Strangely, it sticks Tofu Feathers together particularly well. You have to wonder what else it could be used for.

name: Grossewer Raeman Skin
description: Once washed, this skin can be used as a carpet or a doormat.

name: Jelly Blubber
description: This blubber is similar to that extracted from a Jelly's heart. Used in cooking, it's an excellent preservative and gives a nice meaty tang to your meals.

name: Skeleton Black Wabbit Headband
description: The crafters don't yet know enough about this item for its characteristics to be revealed to potential buyers.

name: Brownish Pompom
description: Made from a Waddict tail, this pompom owes its brown colour to its original owner's chocolate-rich diet. At least that's the official story…

name: Bontarian Rat Hair
description: This hair used to belong to the Bonta sewer rats. Indeed, they were the only ones to have hair tufts which matched the colour of their city wall.

name: Brakmarian Rat Hair
description: This hair used to belong to the Brakmar sewer rats. Indeed, they were the only ones to have hair tufts which matched the colour of their city wall.

name: Blopshroom Flower
description: This flower has been plucked from the head of a Blopshroom. Don't worry about it, the Blopshroom never liked it anyway.

name: Skeleton Black Wabbit Ossicle
description: Make sure this ossicle doesn't get lost amongst your collection of Skeleton Wabbit bones. Any more than the regulation 224 bones and your limited edition life-size Skeleton Wabbit model will have knobbly bits all over the place. You heard: only 224 bones! Start collecting now!

name: Waddict Tooth
description: Just looking at this once-sweet tooth makes you wish you'd brushed your teeth not twice but thrice.

name: Bulbush Root
description: This Bulbush Root is not like other roots. It can be chewed for ages and you won't lose your teeth. Be careful though, unlike real sweets, it tastes awful!

name: Bulbush Leaf
description: These leaves only grow in one place, on the heads of Bulbushes, so do not attempt to grow one on your own head, as it would fade very quickly.

name: Petunia
description: The harder you are, the bigger you fall.

name: Black Wabbit Bobtail
description: Black Wabbits shake their bobtails like crazy to warn their cousins of approaching danger. Looks like this one didn't work too well.

name: Trunkiblop Root
description: The Trunkiblop has great big roots which draw up anything adventurers throw on the ground.

name: Suspicious Wrapper
description: Whatever was inside was fatty, melt-in-your-mouth, deliciousness.

name: Skeleton Wabbit Bone
description: Just 223 more bones and you can build a Skeleton Wabbit model of your own! Just look at the result! Tall, strong, bony, attractive: 223 more bones and this Skeleton Wabbit could be yours! Want this handsome Skeleton Wabbit in your living room? Only 223 bones to go! Call now!

name: Skeleton Wabbit Skull
description: You've hit the jackpot! This skull is the most important of the 224 Skeleton Wabbit bones you need to reconstruct a REAL Skeleton Wabbit in the comfort of your own home! Look at its definition, its nobility. Want to see the rest of this tip-top, Cawwot-nibbling hunk? Only 223 bones to go! Call now!

name: Golden Larva Skin
description: Wild Enutrofs love to wear coats made of Golden Larva Skin because it makes them feel rich.

name: Sword Pommel
description: It must have taken an ultra-powerful blow to shatter this mythical sword. People say that whoever holds the sword of an Ouginak can't help but roar with joy! Ah-woooooo!

name: Bionic Eye
description: This modified eye lets you detect any object or individual that contains chocolate.

name: Ouginak Chain
description: This damned Chain comes from an Ouginak, obviously. It was probably used to tie the Ouginak up so that it couldn't escape, before it was broken.

name: Ouginak Hair
description: This hair will definitely keep you warm; your hands are getting sweaty just looking at it! Although that might be because you're terrified of being seen with it by another Ouginak, who might just be tempted to avenge his friend...

name: Golden Larva Tooth
description: The crafters don't yet know enough about this item for its characteristics to be revealed to potential buyers.

name: Minor Teleb
description: Keep your friends far away and your enemies even further.

name: Traumatised Rokokonut
description: This Rokokonut was traumatised as a child, and so, over the years, has accumulated an incredible amount of hatred. This hatred has rendered it a very powerful Rokokonut indeed.

name: Breaded Fish
description: A cubic fish renowned for its particularly one dimensional thought processes. This piscatorial cretin is exceedingly easy to catch.

name: Gutted Blue Ray
description: This Blue Ray can now be used as an ingredient.

name: Yellow Carapace
description: But where's the owner hiding? Maybe he's having a nap inside.

name: Kokostraw
description: To sip a fresh drink, you need a coloured straw. Now, you'll have to find a hole in the Kokonut.

name: Turtle Milk
description: What a good idea! Turtle Milk in a bottle! You can drink it whenever and wherever you want.

name: Rice Flour
description: This flour is perfect for making cement or even bedding for your dog.

name: Magic Bamboo Plank
description: A handyman could use this plank to make something delightful - a coffin, for example. Just bear that in mind.

name: Great Sacrum
description: The Great Coralator offered you a bone from its backside. It doesn't have much use for it anyway.

name: Coralator Fabric
description: This humid rag was long hidden underwater where particles of coral covered its surface thread by thread. It's a pity it's as hard as stone - it would have made a nice hanky.

name: Grozilla False Tooth
description: Grozilla had some false teeth cast to make himself look dreadfully frightening. On your small frame, the effect is even more terrifying.

name: Bworkette Essence
description: This essence contains a part of the immense power of a dungeon keeper: the pick of the litter of monsters in the World of Twelve. Now you just have to find a use befitting such power.

name: Earth Da Tra Ra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes your blows much, much more brutal.

name: Fire Da Tra Ra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes your blows much, much more thought-out.

name: Gutted Farle's Ray
description: This Farle's Ray can now be used as an ingredient.

name: Kokonut Slice
description: Finally something that reminds you of your holiday. That travel agency has got it coming!

name: Bwork Helmet
description: In the Bwork clan, the Bwork Magus are in charge of the forge. They are equipped with a helmet from birth to avoid any accidents, such as falls and hammer blows.

name: Bulbig Root
description: This Bulbig Root is not like other roots, well, apart from Bulbiflor Roots, Bulbush Roots and Bulbamboo Roots, that is. Like them, it can be chewed for ages and you won't lose your teeth. Be careful though, unlike real sweets, it tastes awful! I think you knew that already, though.

name: Dam Rune
description: This rune will increase damage to your enemies.

name: Yew Plank
description: A handyman could use this plank to make something delightful - a coffin, for example. Just bear that in mind.

name: Smiths' Chest Lock
description: When you smashed the Smiths' Chest to smithereens to get the loot hidden inside, you didn't even notice that the lock attached to it was never actually locked. Obviously, your motto that day was: act first, think second. Iop would be proud of you.

name: Seasonal Pebble
description: This little pebble is warm in spring, hot in summer, cool in autumn and icy cold in winter. Some people refuse flat out to believe that this is possible, whilst others spend as long marvelling at it as they do choosing their first set.

name: Smiths' Essence
description: This essence contains a part of the immense power of a dungeon keeper: the pick of the litter of monsters in the World of Twelve. Now you just have to find a use befitting such power.

name: Kwakwa Essence
description: This essence contains a part of the immense power of a dungeon keeper: the pick of the litter of monsters in the World of Twelve. Now you just have to find a use befitting such power.

name: Bulbig Brotha Root
description: As well as carrying the food and moisture it needs to survive, Bulbig Brotha roots are excellent sensors for underground goings-on.

name: Tender Meat
description: The secret of tenderising this meat is the same as that of a successful education - hit subject with The Fellow Pages.

name: Tender Carrion
description: The fact that you’re constantly rubbing this meat against your cheek reveals a deep emotional void.

name: Ra Dam Per Rune
description: This rune will increase ranged damage.

name: Me Res Per Rune
description: This rune will reduce melee damage.

name: Neutral Da Ko Ra Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes your blows much, much more impartial.

name: Air Da Tra Ra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes your blows much, much more nimble.

name: Kokokonut Palm Trunk
description: Kokokonut Palm Trunks are similar to other trunks: straight and strong, yet they are slightly thinner than the average.

name: Blacksmith Dungeon Key
description: This key will grant you access to the Blacksmith Dungeon. Be careful, it will self-destruct after use.

name: Igloo Fish
description: This rare species of breaded fish usually lives, as its name indicates, in the icy waters of the far North. Because of its polar diet, its flesh is rich in fibre.

name: Small Golden Pearl
description: This golden pearl is a gift from the small larva you have accompanied. Consequently, it has a great sentimental value… and some monetary value too. Its softness and colour make it a perfect gift for every person who has even the slightest feminine side.

name: Bamboo Shoots
description: Being completely tasteless, these bamboo shoots are not a popular foodstuff. You should cut them down with a well-rusted scythe and marinate them for a couple years in Greedovore juice before you serve them up to your friends. Another tip from unscrupulous restaurateurs willing to feed you anything at all.

name: Bamboo Plank
description: An alchemist could use this plank to make something delightful - a pet improvement potion, for example.

name: Shin Larva Skin
description: This Shin Larva skin is even more sticky and slimy than you'd have ever imagined. It reminds you of the last princess you rescued.

name: Shin Larva Tooth
description: No one would have ever believed that a Shin Larva would actually have a mouth full of teeth. It's probably because Shin Larvae only have one tooth.

name: Bworkette Skin
description: The Bworkette let you take some of her skin in exchange for your clemency. But she forgot to tell you that she told her big brother Bworker… he might want some of yours in exchange!

name: Bworkette Hair
description: The Bworkette has very soft skin everywhere but under her arms. Well, the little cookies she makes have to be flavoured somehow, don't they?

name: Grotto Hesque Key
description: This strange key will enable you to enter the Grotto Hesque in one piece.

name: Crimson Pebble
description: You can skim this pebble beautifully across the surface of lakes or off the foreheads of people who are weaker than you.

name: Grozilla Scale
description: The newspapers are filled with Grozilla and Grasmera's doings, and handbags made with their scales are must-have accessories in high-flying circles. Some say these bags make their owner sprout a third arm; others claim they grant superpowers, or at least glow-in-the-dark powers. It's as if the good old class spells weren't enough for people!

name: Black Wabbit Paw
description: The crafters don't yet know enough about this item for its characteristics to be revealed to potential buyers.

name: Shin Larva Essence
description: This essence contains a part of the immense power of a dungeon keeper: the pick of the litter of monsters in the World of Twelve. Now you just have to find a use befitting such power.

name: Ougaa
description: Keep your friends close, and get the heck away from your enemies.

name: Me Dam Per Rune
description: This rune will increase melee damage.

name: Water Da Ko Ra Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes your blows much, much more refreshing.

name: Air Da Ko Ra Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes your blows much, much more nimble.

name: Water Da Tra Ra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes your blows much, much more refreshing.

name: Neutral Da Tra Ra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes your blows much, much more impartial.

name: Kokokonut
description: Round as a cannonball, the Kokokonut also has 3 holes, which makes it very easy to throw away.

name: Blue Carapace
description: But where's the owner hiding? Maybe he's in the shower.

name: Tikokoko Leaf
description: The hardiest hunters always want to recover a Tikokoko Leaf as a souvenir, whatever the cost, and then never come back to this cursed island. Why would they?

name: Bwork Epaulette
description: The epaulette is essential for the young Bworks' education, even if 'training' would be a more appropriate word to describe it.

name: Bwork Dungeon Key
description: This interesting key will allow you to drag open the door of the Bwork Dungeon... It can't promise you'll get out of there alive though.

name: Great Coralator Relic
description: This impressive relic might make you forget all of your worries.

name: Mineral Potion
description: Heavier than heavy water, this potion is perfect for keeping the fishes' heads above water so they don't drown.

name: Amber Pebble
description: This amber pebble is as rusty as your fighting skills and looks a lot like a gold nugget... if you squint slightly and turn your head 45 degrees to the left, that is! It might be best just trying to sell it to those that have never seen a gold nugget before.

name: Great Coralator Essence
description: This essence contains a part of the immense power of a dungeon keeper: the pick of the litter of monsters in the World of Twelve. Now you just have to find a use befitting such power.

name: We Dam Per Rune
description: This rune will increase weapon damage.

name: Ra Res Per Rune
description: This rune will reduce ranged damage.

name: Earth Da Ko Ra Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes your blows much, much more brutal.

name: Fire Da Ko Ra Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes your blows much, much more thought-out.

name: Eguntew Foot
description: It won't bring you good luck, or bad luck either for that matter. It's just a little foot…

name: Diamond
description: Diamonds are a jeweller's best friend, but they require great skill to be worked properly. To find some, you often need to venture into dangerous mines. Good thing Diamonds are forever; you wouldn't want to be doing that twice a year!

name: Emerald
description: Glowing vivid green, this magnificent jewel can easily transform a frog into a prince, no kissing required.

name: Walnut
description: Walnuts can be used to make oil but it's better to consume them dried if you'd rather not suffer their laxative properties.

name: Ruby
description: The shimmering glow of this precious stone makes it as bright as the Fire Kwak's feathers, but its surface is as cold to the touch as the Ice Kwak's snowballs.

name: Gutted Shiny Sardine
description: This Shiny Sardine can now be used as an ingredient.

name: Gutted Dark Sardine
description: This Dark Sardine can now be used as an ingredient.

name: Green Carapace
description: But where's the owner hiding? Maybe he went out to buy some pizza.

name: Red Carapace
description: But where's the owner hiding? Maybe he moved out a short while ago.

name: Great Coral
description: The only difference between the Worn Coral and the Great Coral is their size and what you can do with them. However, a whole lot of worn Corals will never replace a Great Coral.

name: Kwakwa's Nest Key
description: This key will allow you to study the Kwaks in their natural habitat, and who knows, you might even reach the summit.

name: Spe Dam Per Rune
description: This rune will increase spell damage.

name: Ruby Larva Skin
description: This skin was the principal material used whilst renovating the Xelor Temple's clock mechanism.

name: Ruby Larva Tooth
description: A necklace of these teeth would make the perfect accessory for your ruby wedding anniversary.

name: Wabbit Fabric
description: This fabric, made from Gwandpa Wabbit Beard Hairs, is very bushy, as well as irritating, a bit like a fat, urticant caterpillar.

name: Wabbit Paw
description: Many tourists come to the Wabbit Islands especially to find a Wabbit Paw which is supposed to be a lucky charm. Unfortunately it's not true, but keep it to yourself or tourism could suffer.

name: Minor Boble
description: You can't taste a Dofus without breaking the shell.

name: Emerald Larva Skin
description: This larva skin between keeps friendship green.

name: Emerald Larva Tooth
description: This tooth would make the perfect lucky charm for your emerald wedding anniversary; it wards off evil spirits and halitosis.

name: Broken Chains
description: Do as the Dark Miners did! Break the chains that bind you to this life of slavery, tell your masters where to stick it, and wreak havoc everywhere you go! The revolution is now! Also, if anything, well y'know... happens to you during the revolution, these chains will look so cool hanging off your ghost!

name: Crab Pincer
description: The Crab claw is like a deadly, unbreakable peacock feather… a great source of pride to its previous owner.

name: Crocodyl Scale
description: This Crocodyl Scale is like a little trophy for all beginner Crocodyl hunters. Don't hesitate to show it to the drunkards at the Inn. They'll be impressed and will offer you a drink to celebrate your success.

name: Shroud
description: To gain credibility, Ghosts roll themselves up in a Shroud. That's one way of frightening lost adventurers.

name: Broken Trident
description: Here's a little souvenir of your Lousy Pig friend. Hopefully he's not upset enough to track you across the plains... Given his piggish nature, it's definitely possible. Be careful.

name: Raul Mops Eye
description: Only tourists would be dumb enough to believe that this eye belonged to a Raul Mops.

name: Bad Boy Tattoo
description: This tattoo comes from some unfortunate beefcake. It seems to have been bitten off... It's no doubt a souvenir taken by a sentimental murderer.

name: Old Partition Sheet Music
description: The crafters don't yet know enough about this item for its characteristics to be revealed to potential buyers.

name: Nyoro
description: It's said that it can hypnotize, but no one's really clear how or why it would do that.

name: Elite Chafer Dentures
description: Elite Chafers' teeth are ruined by too much drinking, which is why they use dentures. These dentures cost a fortune because the teeth are made from gold and the foetid breath of Elite Chafers endows said gold with unpredictable powers.

name: Lousy Pig Leather Briefs
description: "A Lousy Pig without briefs is a dead Lousy Pig." Such was the favourite expression of Lady Harre, a disciple of Feca and a dedicated peeping Tom. Her favourite pastime was sneaking up on her friends and putting Lousy Pig briefs over their heads.

name: Lousy Pig Chops
description: Lousy Pig Chops have a special taste. Some people cook them with a spicy sauce, others eat them raw. As for the Lousy Pig, it prefers your chops. To each his own… recipe.

name: Crocodyl Bone
description: This strange, greenish bone came from a Crocodyl's leg. The tears the poor animal wept when he saw one of his extremities was missing were certainly not tears of the crocodile sort.

name: Draugur Chafer Jaw
description: The Draugur Chafer is known for the powerful noises he makes. Despite his lack of vocal cords, he produces the strangest of cries that sound somewhere between a gargle and an incredibly husky voice. You picked up his jaw as a souvenir of the joyous moments he brought you.

name: Starfish Eyelid
description: Some starfish have stars in their eyes, while others turn their eyes to the stars. As for the starfish on the Asse Coast, well, they only have eyes for the muscle-bound adventurers who strut along the beaches in the summer.

name: Black Tiwabbit Hair
description: This black hair doesn't show the dirt. This is an advantage that will interest the kind of hero who thinks that a brisk walk through the rain is as good as a bath. The hair melts when it touches sweat, though.

name: Mumussel Lining
description: This syrupy lining is useless, unless of course you want to wait for it to fossilise into mother of pearl. There's a rumour going around that a shrewd and especially attractive Enutrof has found a way to speed up the process.

name: Tuft of White Hair
description: Finally, conclusive evidence that even monsters get stressed out.

name: Bone Fragment
description: This fragment of bone has either come from the remains of a Chafer or from the leftovers of a Moowolf meal. There's also a large chance that it hasn't got anything to do with either one.

name: Starfish Tongue
description: Several illustrious Amakna thinkers are still stumped as to what use a Starfish Trooper could possibly have for a tongue. They would probably be shocked if they knew.

name: Mutilated Bear
description: This small Bear Head is in poor condition. Some string, a bit of fresh tissue and plenty of imagination will transform this horrible thing into a magnificent headgear.

name: Family Relic
description: Several stories explain how this relic was passed down from generation to generation. Is it a cursed pasta necklace made by a schoolchild for Mother's Day, knicker elastic stolen from a grave by a tomb profaner, or a fossilised bogey rosary? Only an expert will be able to tell you that.

name: Black Tiwabbit Headband
description: This headband gives the appearance of a fierce warrior to the Black Tiwabbit who wears it. The Wabbit Wambo is apparently behind this custom of wearing a headband.

name: Elite Chafer Arrowhead
description: This rusty arrowhead is made from a rare metal that is only found on these arrowheads.

name: Chafer Lancer Leather Briefs
description: When winter comes, the Chafer Lancer never leaves home without his leather briefs... they keep his joints warm and distract his enemies if needs be.

name: Lousy Pig Leather
description: The Lousy Pig nearly disappeared from the food chain. People had to mate Boars with Piglets to fill the lower Cania Plains with Lousy Pigs once more. The Lousy Pig has been mad at the entire world ever since. What a pig.

name: Empty Crab Carapace
description: Once emptied, this crab carapace can hold a good many items. The problem is you'll never be able to get rid of the crabby smell. People have lost friends over much less.

name: Mutilated Makroute
description: This magic Makroute is in poor condition. It didn't stand up to the violence of your attacks and its coat is now dark. A new life could be opening up for it if only you were able to heal it.

name: Pandikaze Skin
description: This skin is still slightly covered by a down as smooth as that on the armpit of an Eniripsa but.. without the sweaty smell.

name: Ghost's Cold Sweat
description: The crafters don't yet know enough about this item for its characteristics to be revealed to potential buyers.

name: Treechnee Hair
description: This hair has a natural resin coating. This means you won't need any glue to stick it to your bald pate or to the palms of your hands.

name: Treechnee Eye
description: This eye, as hard as stone, can double up as a spare billiards ball, if you're into that kind of thing, and you lose one...

name: Chafer Archer Thighbone
description: This is a really strange bone... If you crumble it into dust, you can use it for curry powder. Seriously, just add water and hey presto... curry! I know a few unscrupulous chefs who'll be delighted to hear the news.

name: Crocodyl Teeth
description: When a crocodyl tries to cut its teeth on you, the best solution is to pull one out with determination and vigour, just like a strict dentist would.

name: Chafer Archer Arrow
description: This arrow can be used to craft a short, but sharp, weapon. It can also serve as a toothpick. It all depends where your priorities lie.

name: Pandikaze Hair
description: This extremely thin hair might appear to have been pulled out of the rump of a female Sadida, but don't be mistaken, it hasn't.

name: Raul Mops Skin
description: Raul Mops has a real weakness. He loves to smear himself with water, wine and vinegar. What he loves most of all is rolling peanuts along the road with his nose. Dry roasted, by the way, just in case you ever feel like doing him a favour.

name: Explosive Capsule
description: This capsule contains extracts of magical citrus fruits. You are advised to shake it before opening, so the pulp doesn't stay stuck to the bottom.

name: Pa Earth Dam Rune
description: Strongly associated with Earth, this rune will definitely strengthen your mastery of this element.

name: Pa Water Dam Rune
description: Strongly associated with Water, this rune will definitely strengthen your mastery of this element.

name: Pa Air Dam Rune
description: Strongly associated with Air, this rune will definitely strengthen your mastery of this element.

name: Pa Neutral Dam Rune
description: Not associated with any particular element at all, this rune will nevertheless strengthen the resolve of the indecisive when making a decision, which is paradoxical.

name: Suspicious Pouch
description: To your great disappointment, there aren't any kamas in this pouch. It contains a few scraps of lead, a handful of peculiarly shaped dice and an old pencil with the rubber half chewed off. Probably the elements required for some kind of suspicious, demonic ritual.

name: Neutral Da Ko Pa Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes your blows much more impartial.

name: Cri Da Ko Pa Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one much more opportunistic.

name: Earth Da Ko Pa Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes your blows much more brutal.

name: Pu Da Tra Pa Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one much more disruptive.

name: Cri Da Tra Pa Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one much more opportunistic.

name: Tiwabbit Ears
description: Once boiled, these small, hairy, brown ears give off a smell of dead Boowolf. A true delight when stuffed with Royal Jelly.

name: Golden Bamboo Plank
description: A handyman could use this plank to make something delightful - a coffin, for example. Just bear that in mind.

name: Pa Psh Dam Rune
description: This rune coats the soles of your shoes with a layer of ice. To be used for winter sports or jokes in poor taste.

name: Pa Fire Dam Rune
description: Strongly associated with Fire, this rune will definitely strengthen your mastery of this element.

name: Air Da Ko Pa Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes your blows much more nimble.

name: Fire Da Tra Pa Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes your blows much more thought-out.

name: Pa Tra Rune
description: This rune increases your traps' power.

name: Sapphire Larva Skin
description: This skin is doted with a particular magic: it glows in the dark when lit up.

name: Minor Dagob
description: When well the battle goes, happen the worst does not.

name: Fire Da Ko Pa Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes your blows much more thought-out.

name: Water Da Tra Pa Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes your blows much more refreshing.

name: Air Da Tra Pa Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes your blows much more nimble.

name: Bwork Magus Beard Hair
description: For obscure reasons, this red hair smells very bad when it's raining. The Bwork Magi take advantage of its magic powers nevertheless, which could be of interest to some alchemists.

name: Bwork Magus Book
description: This book is a true collector's item. It's a source of inspiration and sturdiness for the Bwork Magus. Each page conceals numerous secrets about the anatomy of Amakna's creatures.

name: Raw Mother of Pearl
description: This mother of pearl will be beautiful when polished.

name: Pa Cri Dam Rune
description: Your senses have been strongly heightened since you came into possession of this rune. It will allow you to accomplish even more extraordinary feats.

name: Sapphire Larva Tooth
description: Dipped in Mimilk, this tooth would make the perfect breakfast for your sapphire wedding anniversary.

name: Tiwabbit Whiskers
description: These whiskers feel divine against the soft, pure skin of your cheek. If only your grandma's whiskers felt the same.

name: Pu Da Ko Pa Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one much more disruptive.

name: Water Da Ko Pa Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes your blows much more refreshing.

name: Earth Da Tra Pa Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes your blows much more brutal.

name: Neutral Da Tra Pa Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes your blows much more impartial.

name: Cawwot
description: It's the only food a Tiwabbit Wosungwee can eat, which is as good an excuse as any for its severe retardation.

name: Wind Kwak Beak
description: Thanks to its extraordinarily strong beak, the Wind Kwak can fly into a window without being knocked out, just for the pleasure of flying into a window without being knocked out. Wind Kwaks are strange creatures, that's for sure.

name: Treechnid Bud
description: During puberty, Treechnids are covered with ugly buds full of juicy sap and rich in vitamins. Later, these buds will give birth to new shoots which will give birth to buds.

name: Treechnid Amber
description: This magnificent gem is made of fossilised Treechnid Resin. You can sometimes find a little Arachnee trapped inside, caught for aeons in the sticky sap, which was a well-deserved death for that kind of monster.

name: Earth Kwak Feather
description: A distinctive feature of this feather is that it resists falling rocks. That's why Earth Kwaks are never buried by landslides.

name: Major Arachnee Leg
description: A very thin and very hairy Leg, formerly used in the making of exotic brooms and wigs.

name: Plain Boar Snout
description: At first sight, this snout doesn't look very fresh. But don't be mistaken, it's the most tender and most refined snout that ever did sniff.

name: Kwak Claws
description: The Kwak is no scavenger. The rotting flesh under his claw-nails is, in fact... well, I'll spare you the details.

name: Black Scaraleaf Antennae
description: The Black Scaraleaf never knew himself why he was given these antennae. Nature can be cruel sometimes.

name: Greasy Tofurby Feather
description: The Tofurby regularly smears himself with grease to stop his feathers falling off his plumage. A technique as old as the hills, which enables some Enutrofs to keep some of their hair beyond puberty.

name: Airworm
description: This airworm is the favourite dish of wild Kwaks. The odd thing is that it remains alive once extracted from the Kwak's stomach.

name: Dead Major Arachnee
description: You did good picking it up, it's intact. Dead but intact.

name: Tiwabbit Wosungwee Branch
description: Tie a Dofus to the end of this branch and perch on the shoulders of a slow-witted Astrubian and he'll carry you wherever you need to go without question!

name: Ice Kwak Feather
description: A distinctive feature of this feather is that it is resistant to frost. That's why you never see an Ice Kwak shiver.

name: Wind Kwak Feather
description: A distinctive feature of this feather is that it resists gusts of wind. That's why you never see Wind Kwaks get blown inside out like an umbrella.

name: Treechnid Bark
description: This piece of bark is rough, cracked, covered with small bumps and smells strangely good, just like the heel of an Enutrof's foot.

name: Plain Boar Tail
description: Many Brakmarian Poachers collect this hairy trophy. The reasons why are still unknown nowadays.

name: Worn Coral
description: Coral only loosens itself from the Coralator when the weather is dry. Coral is a beautiful substance and is often used to make jewellery. Other brutes actually eat it… but only because they mistake it for crab sticks.

name: Wabbit Teeth
description: They might be a bit worn from all that Cawwot-munching malarkey, but Wabbit Teeth are great for making potions thanks to their rejuvenating properties.

name: Ice Kwak Beak
description: Thanks to its extraordinarily strong beak, the Ice Kwak can peck holes in ice, just for the pleasure of pecking holes in ice. Ice Kwaks are strange creatures, that's for sure.

name: Treechnid Root
description: This piece of root has gained a lot of experience accompanying the Treechnid through the undergrowth. That still doesn't explain why it's magic.

name: Amber
description: This magnificent precious stone is made of fossilised tree resin. You can sometimes find a little Moskito inside, trapped for aeons in the sticky sap, which makes the stone even more valuable.

name: Earth Kwak Beak
description: Thanks to its extraordinarily strong beak, the Earth Kwak can peck holes in the ground, just for the pleasure of pecking holes in ground. Earth Kwaks are strange creatures, that's for sure.

name: Waterworm
description: This waterworm is the favourite dish of wild Kwaks. The odd thing is that it remains alive once extracted from the Kwak's stomach.

name: Trunknid Wood Plank
description: A handyman could use this plank to make something delightful - a coffin, for example. Just bear that in mind.

name: Black Scaraleaf Carapace
description: Turned upside down, this carapace can be used as an ashtray.

name: Coralator Coccyx
description: This strategically-located bone enables the Coralator to sit down with dignity. Now that he's dead, you can use it to establish your own authority upon his fellow creatures.

name: Tiwabbit Wosungwee Tongue
description: This tongue is completely dried out from having slobbered too long over an inaccessible Cawwot. You know, the same thing will happen to your whole body if you spend too long running after Dofus.

name: Behelit
description: He who seeks only to dominate their adversaries dies with a collar around his neck.

name: Fire Kwak Beak
description: Thanks to its extraordinarily strong beak, the Fire Kwak can put out embers, just for the pleasure of putting out embers. Fire Kwaks are strange creatures, that's for sure.

name: Fire Kwak Feather
description: A distinctive feature of this feather is that it resists flames. That's why Fire Kwaks don't burn.

name: Resin
description: This small portion of resin has many uses, mostly in the kitchen. But avoid eating it the way it is now, assuming you like having teeth.

name: Dead Blop
description: You did good picking it up, it's intact. Dead but intact.

name: Earthworm
description: This earthworm is the favourite dish of wild Kwaks. The odd thing is that it remains alive once extracted from the Kwak's stomach.

name: Fireworm
description: This fireworm is the favourite dish of wild Kwaks. The odd thing is that it remains alive once extracted from the Kwak's stomach.

name: Black Scaraleaf Wings
description: Unlike what some adventurers may think, Black Scaraleaf Wings are not black, but white. Another mystery Mother Nature gave us to discuss at the Inn.

name: Piece of Badoul's Treasure
description: A rare item from the treasure trove of Dodge, one of the greatest Ecaflips Amakna ever knew.

name: Mojeeto Bulb
description: Palmflowers don't grow from seeds but a bulb soaked in alcohol. Why? Just because!

name: Cashew Nut
description: When harvested, unripe Cashew Nuts can be used to make oil. Once dried, they're also used as toys by simple-minded Iop children.

name: Bwork Archer Scalp
description: Here is a scalp which could start a new fashion in the Enutrof world: the Toopish. A little bit of anti-lice potion and you'll be ready to participate in the "World's Classiest Enutrof" Contest.

name: Passaoh Petal
description: The colour of this petal reveals its doubtful origin. Alcohol abuse can even be seen in the creations of Otomai's disciples.

name: Piece of Claw's Jigsaw
description: A rare item from the treasure trove of Dodge, one of the greatest Ecaflips Amakna ever knew.

name: Vampire Straw
description: Never underestimate a vampire, especially when they're holding a straw; they could suck your blood until their thirst is quenched.

name: Mahlibuh Petal
description: The colour of this petal reveals its doubtful origin. Alcohol abuse can even be seen in the creations of Otomai's disciples.

name: Kurasso Bulb
description: Palmflowers don't grow from seeds but a bulb soaked in alcohol. Why? Just because!

name: Mahlibuh Bulb
description: Palmflowers don't grow from seeds but a bulb soaked in alcohol. Why? Just because!

name: Passaoh Bulb
description: Palmflowers don't grow from seeds but a bulb soaked in alcohol. Why? Just because!

name: Counterfeit Royal Seal
description: This fake but very real-looking seal might just help out those that aren't too bothered about having the real deal. Getting caught with this seal will result in a century of imprisonment.

name: Bwork Archer Briefs
description: The Bwork Archer had the bad habit of putting his arrows away into his leather briefs. This might explain why the Bwork Archer's arrows are said to be poisoned.

name: Kurasso Petal
description: The colour of this petal reveals its doubtful origin. Alcohol abuse can even be seen in the creations of Otomai's disciples.

name: Mojeeto Petal
description: The colour of this petal reveals its doubtful origin. Alcohol abuse can even be seen in the creations of Otomai's disciples.

name: We Da Ko Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one a bit more skilful.

name: Clo Da Tra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one a bit closer.

name: Mojeeto Coral
description: This coral's remarkable yellow colour is a result of the Mojeeto Craboral's unhealthy diet. It doesn't even manage to eat a single piece of fruit or veg a day, let alone 5!

name: Craboral Pincer
description: Just avoid shaking a Craboral on the pincer! You might lose your hand to politeness.

name: Spe Da Tra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one a bit more mysterious.

name: We Da Tra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one a bit more skilful.

name: Passaoh Coral
description: This coral's remarkable red colour is a result of the Passaoh Craboral's unhealthy diet. It doesn't even manage to eat a single piece of fruit or veg a day, let alone 5!

name: Clo Da Ko Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one a bit closer.

name: Bulbiflor Flower
description: This flower only grows on the head of the Bulbiflor, so don't try putting on yours... the substrate is not rich enough.

name: Kurasso Coral
description: This coral's remarkable blue colour is a result of the Kurasso Craboral's unhealthy diet. It doesn't even manage to eat a single piece of fruit or veg a day, let alone 5!

name: Mahlibuh Coral
description: This coral's remarkable green colour is a result of the Mahlibuh Craboral's unhealthy diet. It doesn't even manage to eat a single piece of fruit or veg a day, let alone 5!

name: Dis Da Ko Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one a bit more distant.

name: Dis Da Tra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one a bit more distant.

name: Bulbiflor Root
description: This Bulbiflor Root is not like other roots. It can be chewed for ages and you won't lose your teeth. Be careful though, unlike real sweets, it tastes awful!

name: Spe Da Ko Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one a bit more mysterious.

name: Carbon Paper
description: The crafters don't yet know enough about this item for its characteristics to be revealed to potential buyers.

name: Dynamo
description: Better hope you can hit a moving target…

name: Seed of Contention
description: Sown by troublemakers and the god Mikart, these seeds germinate rapidly and grow into large plants surprisingly quickly. Dark Bakers use slices of the plants' fruits to garnish their pies, and then delight in throwing them at your face.

name: Dopple Stone
description: This stone comes from the Dopple World. It's highly-prized by some inhabitants of Amakna.

name: Dopple Mirror
description: The reflection that you see in this mirror is deformed by your darkest thoughts. Another reason to believe that beauty isn't on the inside.

name: Walnut Wood
description: Walnut Wood is often used in the making of furniture.

name: Oats
description: This type of cereal is used to feed the young Tabis, whose teeth are not sufficiently developed for hard foods. The peasants nevertheless dished it out with a fearful moderation, being well aware of the eye-watering damage wrought by a fibre-fed intestinal tract.

name: Ebonite
description: This rare alloy is used in the making of rare and often lethal items. It is a too-little-known fact that Ebonite, once it has rusted, becomes a dangerous poison.

name: Gutted Siktrin Bass
description: The Siktrin Bass can now be used as an ingredient.

name: Broken Chafer Helmet
description: You can't use this helmet in such a state. It would hurt your head. Get a good tailor to put some padding in, and pad his pockets at the same time.

name: Bambooto Wood
description: Bambooto Wood is almost as expensive as Wobbly Wood yet it's a lot more common. It doesn't make sense, does it?

name: Scaraleaf Dungeon Key
description: This wonderful golden key will grant you access to the Scaraleaf Dungeon. And you thought you'd seen it all.

name: Cri Dam Rune
description: Your senses have been heightened since you came into possession of this rune. It will allow you to accomplish even more extraordinary feats.

name: Fire Dam Rune
description: Associated with Fire, this rune will definitely strengthen your mastery of this element.

name: Batofu Essence
description: This essence contains a part of the immense power of a dungeon keeper: the pick of the litter of monsters in the World of Twelve. Now you just have to find a use befitting such power.

name: Kamyum
description: Unless you're a Vilinsekt, this kamyum, sticky with honey, probably won't be worth much to you… Unless, of course, you're an adventurer who has just completed the "Miniature Adventure" quest, in which case you can use it to persuade Verminus to follow you around wherever you go.

name: Pa Re Water Rune
description: This rune will increase fixed resistance to Water damage.

name: Pa Re Earth Rune
description: This rune will increase fixed resistance to Earth damage.

name: Earth Da Ko Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes your blows a bit more brutal.

name: Air Da Ko Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes your blows a bit more nimble.

name: Crystal
description: Crystal is translucent and beautiful, but extremely brittle. Such is life, nothing is perfect even with precious stones.

name: Kittenfish
description: The Kittenfish has two unusual characteristics - it has whiskers and it purrs underwater to frighten flying fish.

name: Golden Scarabugly Entrails
description: These entrails are responsible for the difficult digestions of the Golden Scarabugly. You are entitled to fry them without feeling remorse.

name: Golden Scarabugly Antennae
description: If you want to look like Korgamone the Carpathian Capon, it's very simple - stick these antennae in your nostrils and sing out loud.

name: Golden Scarabugly Wings
description: If you've always dreamt of flying like a fat Piwi, stick these wings to your belt and jump from the Tower of Orders in Brakmar. As well as giving the locals a laugh, you'll make a great meal for Crobaks.

name: Earth Dam Rune
description: Associated with Earth, this rune will definitely strengthen your mastery of this element.

name: Air Dam Rune
description: Associated with Air, this rune will definitely strengthen your mastery of this element.

name: Neutral Dam Rune
description: Not associated with any particular element, this rune will nevertheless strengthen the resolve of the indecisive when making a decision, which is paradoxical.

name: Haunted House Key
description: You can use this key to take a trip around the Haunted House at the Trool Fair. You disclaim any liability for personal injury and damages caused by its misuse.

name: Boostoplasm
description: No one knows how Boostache secretes this strange substance, or from where it comes. All that's known about it is that it's white, it's sticky, and it glows in the dark.

name: Ronin Chafer Thighbone
description: It is said that the weapons made from these black Ronin Chafer bones are so sharp that they can cut through butter. This time, it's not just a legend…

name: Golden Scarabugly Essence
description: This essence contains a part of the immense power of a dungeon keeper: the pick of the litter of monsters in the World of Twelve. Now you just have to find a use befitting such power.

name: Pa Re Air Rune
description: This rune will increase fixed resistance to Air damage.

name: Pu Da Ko Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one a bit more disruptive.

name: Water Da Ko Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes your blows a bit more refreshing.

name: Pu Da Tra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one a bit more disruptive.

name: Neutral Da Tra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes your blows a bit more impartial.

name: Blaze Potion
description: This crackling potion contains fire magic, and can be used to enchant all sorts of items.

name: Gutted Lard Bass
description: The Lard Bass can now be used as an ingredient.

name: Bambooto Amber
description: This Amber is usually hung on top of the Bambooto. It is mainly decorative, but it can be dangerous if the Bambooto decides to fall on you, for example. What a clever creature!

name: Tra Rune
description: This rune will increase the power of your traps.

name: Tofu House Key
description: This key, made of Tofu feathers, can tickle the inside of many locks into hysterics of opening. It will grant you access to Farle Ingalsse's Tofu House.

name: Batofu Feather
description: This feather was plucked from the Batofu's armpit, and it smells like a marinated ancestral Doobitchoo.

name: Mother of Pearl
description: This material is made from aragonite crystals and shellite. It was unknown up until Otomai Island was discovered and shellite was found on the Craborals there. This element is very precious to alchemists, although the recipes in which it's used are always jealously guarded.

name: Boostache Moustache
description: Boostache always had a bit of a complex about not being able to grow hairs on his chin, and in fact, about not having a chin at all, sadly. To compensate, he grew this superb moustache.

name: Kwismas Dungeon Key
description: This key was made by local craftsmen. Some of Kwismas Island's weaker monsters also have copies of it.

name: Boostache Essence
description: This essence contains a part of the immense power of a dungeon keeper: the pick of the litter of monsters in the World of Twelve. Now you just have to find a use befitting such power.

name: Ronin Chafer Essence
description: This essence contains a part of the immense power of a dungeon keeper: the pick of the litter of monsters in the World of Twelve. Now you just have to find a use befitting such power.

name: Kickroach Leg
description: This leg is a vital ingredient for a great many dishes prepared by Amakna's chefs. Shame they're all inedible.

name: Mineral Meat
description: Way back when, Mineral Meat was simply used to fuel fires, as it was deemed inappropriate for consumption - it wasn't even something you'd feed to animals. These days, it's become fashionable to mix it with other products to sell it in the form of patties, raviolis, pâtés...

name: Pa Re Neutral Rune
description: This rune will increase fixed resistance to Neutral damage.

name: Cri Da Ko Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one a bit more opportunistic.

name: Neutral Da Ko Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes your blows a bit more impartial.

name: Cri Da Tra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one a bit more opportunistic.

name: Air Da Tra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes your blows a bit more nimble.

name: Landslide Potion
description: This trembling potion contains earth magic, and can be used to enchant all sorts of items.

name: Shower Potion
description: This undulating potion contains water magic, and can be used to enchant all sorts of items.

name: Kaerlier Wood
description: This wood comes from the legendary Kaerlier. Its properties are quite surprising.

name: Bambooto Leaf
description: Bambooto leaves are quite thick and large, a bit like the female Bwork except less aggressive.

name: Maple Plank
description: A handyman could use this plank to make something delightful - a coffin, for example. Just bear that in mind.

name: Psh Dam Rune
description: This rune coats the soles of your shoes with a fine layer of ice. To be used for winter sports or jokes in poor taste.

name: Kickroach's Lair Key
description: This distinctively shaped key can be used to replace the missing rung from the ladder that leads to Kickroach's Lair.

name: Field Clover
description: In a fight, this clover is reputed to give a sudden and decisive advantage to its team.

name: Mineral Carrion
description: You’ll have no trouble selling this meat if you pass it off as a latest gen biological weapon.

name: Pa Re Fire Rune
description: This rune will increase fixed resistance to Fire damage.

name: Fire Da Ko Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes your blows a bit more thought-out.

name: Earth Da Tra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes your blows a bit more brutal.

name: Fire Da Tra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes your blows a bit more thought-out.

name: Five-Leaf Clover
description: This clover is a staple of the Tabi's diet. Nevertheless, breeders are wary of it because of the devastating flatulence it unleashes upon their livestock.

name: Bronze
description: This metal is often used in the making of decorative items. It's ideal for beautifying your weapons on the cheap.

name: Gust Potion
description: This whistling potion contains air magic, and can be used to enchant all sorts of items.

name: Skeleton Dungeon Key
description: This key will grant you access to the Skeleton Dungeon. Be careful though, as it will self-destruct after use.

name: Tigerfish
description: This fish is much like a Kittenfish, but far, far more dangerous.

name: Big Cannonball
description: This, ladies and gentlemen is a reaaal Cannonball. Heavy as a whipped hippy, it tends to make holes in the skull of anyone who gets too close. Not the best idea then.

name: Dam Ref Rune
description: This rune will enable you to reflect damage more easily.

name: Golden Scarabugly Carapace
description: Put it on your head and this carapace will protect you from bad weather and guano drops.

name: Water Dam Rune
description: Associated with Water, this rune will definitely strengthen your mastery of this element.

name: Farmland Substrate
description: The association of retired but still very brave former firemen who now volunteer at Allister's castle would not recommend you use this liquid to put out fires. Unless you like adding fuel to the fire.

name: Kwismas Dungeon Key Mould
description: Just like the mould you find on bread, this is not meant to be eaten.

name: Kickroach Essence
description: This essence contains a part of the immense power of a dungeon keeper: the pick of the litter of monsters in the World of Twelve. Now you just have to find a use befitting such power.

name: Greal Board
description: This board is the same board used for Brakmar's giant barbecues and pyres.

name: Walnut Sap
description: Sap has numerous uses, but lumberjacks have always preferred using it to make Yule Logs.

name: Water Da Tra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes your blows a bit more refreshing.

name: Trunknid Wood
description: This piece of wood sounds hollow. The green sap coming out of it proves that it is the nose of the Trunknid.

name: Trunknid Eyebrows
description: Ever wondered how Trunknids manage to frighten away chance visitors so easily? The answer's right in front of you: who wouldn't crumble under a glare from eyebrows like these?

name: Green Spimush Gill
description: Whatever the colour, Spimush gills always give off an odour akin to a Prespic with bowel troubles.

name: Croquette
description: To attract a Whitish Fang into the bonds of domesticity, throw him a Croquette - they go crazy for them. He may not tell you, but you'll be friends for life.

name: Red Spimush Gill
description: In the past, Shamans used to stuff their orifices with these gills to communicate with the gods. They would fall into deep trances and have vivid visions, but recent scientific studies have shown that this was basically due to a lack of oxygen from blocked respiratory tracts.

name: Araknawa Leg
description: This small leg will keep wriggling a long time after you pull it out of an Araknawa's body. Put it in your enemies' pants to unsettle them during fights - that way you'll win easily.

name: Blue Spimush Gill
description: Mixed with boiled Gobball Slobber, left to infuse then served to an old Gobball, it restores his old virility for a few hours. Brouce Boulgoure drinks a cup of this fine brew after every meal.

name: Brown Spimush Gill
description: Mycologists agree that the Brown Spimush was originally orange and that this colour variation has something to do with the fecal odour it emits. This theory is strongly refuted by chefs who serve Spimush omelettes in their restaurants.

name: Bulbamboo Root
description: This Bulbamboo Root is not like other roots. It can be chewed for ages and you won't lose your teeth. Be careful though, unlike real sweets, it tastes awful!

name: Bulbamboo Shoot
description: This shoot can grow on the head of the of the Bulbamboo. Don't try putting it on your head, it wouldn't find anything to eat there.

name: Red Scaraleaf Carapace
description: You want a lampshade? You got it! You don't want a lampshade? You got nothing.

name: Green Scaraleaf Carapace
description: You want a lampshade? You got it! You don't want a lampshade? You got nothing.

name: Blue Scaraleaf Wings
description: These Scaraleaf wings have magic properties and are used in the making of elementary Water potions.

name: Green Scaraleaf Wings
description: These Scaraleaf wings have magic properties and are used in the making of elementary Earth potions.

name: White Scaraleaf Antennae
description: No one knows what these antennae are made for...The only certainty is that they smell really bad.

name: White Scaraleaf Carapace
description: You want a lampshade? You got it! You don't want a lampshade? You got nothing.

name: Scaraleaf Entrails
description: At first sight these entrails do not look particularly mouth-watering. However, if you chop them finely with some sun-dried herbs, some wild mint and then braise them in a rusty cauldron, they'll make a satisfying meal for discerning Chafers.

name: Red Scaraleaf Antennae
description: No one knows what these antennae are made for...The only certainty is that they smell really bad.

name: Blue Scaraleaf Carapace
description: You want a lampshade? You got it! You don't want a lampshade? You got nothing.

name: Palm Fruits
description: This strange fruit produces a refined oil when squeezed. What a pity you can't squeeze it because of its shell which is as hard as the sole of Bowisse's Boots.

name: White Scaraleaf Wings
description: These Scaraleaf wings have magic properties and are used in the making of elementary Air potions.

name: Red Scaraleaf Wings
description: These Scaraleaf wings have magic properties and are used in the making of elementary Fire potions.

name: Green Scaraleaf Antennae
description: No one knows what these antennae are made for...The only certainty is that they smell really bad.

name: Blue Scaraleaf Antennae
description: No one knows what these antennae are made for...The only certainty is that they smell really bad.

name: Minor Pikmi
description: You can't make an omelette without breaking a few eggs.

name: Mutant Tofu Tooth
description: The Mutant Tofu swapped its ridiculous little beak for ridiculous big teeth. It's hard to know which one is the more dangerous.

name: Gargoyl Leather
description: This leather is particularly resistant, but smells like a male Gargoyl in rut. That explains why local farmers use it to trap female Gargoyls, who are too stupid to see past such a devious ruse.

name: Silkworm Cocoon
description: This huge, off-white cocoon can be unwound to obtain a magnificent silk string. Legend has it that the adventurer Harry Hane used it to find his way out of Dark Vlad's maze.

name: Ouassingue Hide
description: "This leather must have survived countless wars to be this strong today" were the dying words of the famous minstrel Jon Lemon right before he died, suffocated by the stench of a Ouassingue.

name: Tofurby Stomach
description: This stomach has wonderful elastic properties. Don't worry if there's still a little Clover pulp inside it. In fact, the stuff is great for unblocking congested pipes. Er... That is, pipes under houses. Please don't stick it in your mouth.

name: Prepubescent Boostache Tail
description: Remain hidden in a corner and watch patiently, without making any noise, and you just might see a Prepubescent Boostache wag its little tail. But they only do it during mating season.

name: Chafer Skull
description: This poor Chafer will never rattle again.

name: Kwoan Tooth
description: Very few people are skilled enough to extract a tooth from a Kwoan. Note that this tooth goes up in value when it's damaged. Don't ask me why.

name: Gargoyl Tongue
description: The Gargoyl's breath will make you wish you – or at least your nasal passages – were made of stone. You always have the impression that it ate an over-ripe Trool just before.

name: Ouassingue Stomach
description: Within this stomach hides a surprise. One Enutrof pinky finger, a bit of Osamodas nose… You could almost build a whole hero with all these pieces.

name: Tofukaz Stomach
description: "If you keep eating the same thing, you end up looking like what you eat," was the wise advice of Bontarian chef Boolya Wild. And that's why Tofukaz' stomachs are as green as the grass they eat.

name: Tofoone Fluff
description: It was once used to make fake moustaches, but it can also be used as fake armpit hair.

name: Primitive Chafer Helmet
description: This helmet is made of wood, even though metal and gemstones are much more fashionable; the horn is upside-down; it offers very little real protection… Yes siree, this headgear is just as primitive as its wearer - which is why it looks so good on you.

name: Dark Tissue
description: The peculiarity of this fabric is indisputable. That said, it's very irritating to the touch. You'll understand when I tell you that a Black Tofu used to use it as a handkerchief.

name: Tofukaz Foot
description: How can a Tofukaz be so agile with only two toes, you must surely ask yourself? It's a mystery.

name: Black Tofu Eye
description: Even removed, the gaze of the Black Tofu Eye remains fixed on you. And if you look closely, it's still blinking. What vitality the Black Tofu has!

name: Rotten Egg
description: It's positively shameful. Laying a Tofu Egg that's already decomposing?! You really have to be deranged to have such ideas.

name: Ouassingue Juice
description: Unless you're flaming drunk, there's no way you'll confuse Ouassingue juice with any drinkable liquid you can name. The nauseating stench will dissuade the blind from knocking back a mouthful.

name: Vilinsekt Antennae
description: What better way to prove your strength than by pulling the antennae off poor, defenceless insects? What's more, they grow back, so knock yourself out!

name: Tofu Egg
description: This egg is a bit strange because it smells rotten even when it's not. Just imagine what it must smell like when it really is rotten. No one knows, however, which came first between the Tofu and the Tofu Egg.

name: Wooden Disk
description: This disk can be used to replace the broken wheel on a wooden toy, or plug the nose of a dense child.

name: Ouassingue Fabric
description: This fabric has more holes than Swiss cheese, but it is still capable of absorbing a maximum amount of waste to regurgitate at the least opportune moment.

name: Tofu Feather
description: Tofu Feathers are very magical things - just one kilo of them weighs as much as a kilopod of steel!

name: Garglyph Leather Briefs
description: In order to avoid being hit in the spots where it hurts, the Garglyph sometimes puts on his leather briefs when he goes hunting. The briefs also provide good protection against sunburn.

name: Prepubescent Boostache Leather
description: This smooth skin suits the making of leather underwear perfectly. The leather underpants of the Invisible Chafers are an early example.

name: Scurvion Blood
description: Contrary to received ideas, this very syrupy blood doesn't contain poison. What's more, it can be used to make powerful preservatives and nice beauty masks.

name: Garglyph Tooth
description: You can always hang this tooth from a strap around your neck and claim it used to belong to the terrible trash-vampire, Edward.

name: Vampire Blood
description: This blood is magic and is an essential ingredient of magic black puddings. The side effects remain unknown.

name: Oliviolet Plank
description: A handyman could use this plank to make something delightful - a coffin, for example. Just bear that in mind.

name: Pu Res Tra Pa Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one much more stable.

name: Pumpkin
description: Pumpkins grow in fields. They're not much bigger than Boowolf Testicles, but they certainly taste much better.

name: Kwoan Eye
description: This Kwoan Eye has surprising hypnotic effects. You'll need to keep a close eye on yourself when handling it.

name: Bombu Plank
description: A handyman could use this plank to make something delightful - a coffin, for example. Just bear that in mind.

name: Pa Psh Res Rune
description: Large crampons have appeared on the soles of your shoes, which is very useful if you want to avoid hurting yourself should you slip over. Ridiculous at a ball, however. It's up to you when you use this rune.

name: Pa Cri Res Rune
description: Inexplicably, you think this rune is an effective good luck charm. Perhaps it will help you avoid a spell's ill-effects.

name: Cri Res Tra Pa Rune
