description: An eternal dream rune that makes one much more unflappable.

name: Chafer Foot Soldier's Surprising Bone
description: It's thanks to this magic bone that Chafer Foot Soldiers can achieve the most astonishing of feats. For instance, while in the middle of a fight, they can take off their briefs, put them on their heads without using their hands, and still avoid being hit by attackers. You will never get tired of this incredible performance.

name: Pointed Tooth
description: There's no doubt this tooth used to belong to a vampire. That's plain to see from its dangerously sharp tip.

name: Bat
description: When the going gets tough, the tough turn into bats. Well, it depends how you define tough, I guess. If you're talking about a vampire that snickers before flying off – you know the sound, it's a bit like "gnak gnook gnak gnak" – then "tough" is probably the wrong adjective. Such laughter could put to rout an army. An army of ticks, that is.

name: Pu Res Ko Pa Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one much more stable.

name: Small Pumpkin
description: The Small Pumpkin is tasteful in this season. Big enough to have taste, small enough to avoid the transformation into a Pumpkwin. Succulent and refunded by Hellz Keir.

name: Minor Horiz
description: When the wiseman points to the horizon, the idiot looks at his finger, and the monster eats the finger. The idiot survives, the wiseman is down a finger, and the monster is hopefully sated.

name: Cri Res Ko Pa Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one much more unflappable.

name: Spinal Cord
description: This is some good quality cord. Heavy though... You'd be amazed how many people put their backs out just picking it up!

name: Piglet Milk
description: This Pig Milk comes from a Piglet. Remember this just in case…

name: Rib Chops
description: Grilled Rib Chops are absolutely delicious, but there's not much meat on them.

name: Piglet Leather
description: Just like mimolette, this leather becomes a dirty shade of orange with the passage of time... and the horrible smell... Uggh!

name: Bworcelhain's Heart
description: This heartless Bworkette, who got rid of her son Krazybwork and threw him in a pit, was cursed by Bworknroll when she refused his love. Locked up in a cellar, she feeds herself with her own heart. Every night, it grows back and starts beating again.

name: Ivory
description: Ivory is always in great demand because of its legendary whiteness. Smiths use the stuff when forging lethal weapons. Collectors value it just as highly. You'll have no problem selling this in Amakna.

name: Rib Jaw
description: The Rib is a skinny wee rake... If it loses its jaw on top of that, it'll be about as offensive as an army of hibernating ticks.

name: Palm Oil
description: Thanks to its delicate taste and aroma, this oil is suitable for any kind of culinary challenge, from frying food to making French dressing.

name: Minor Hulhu
description: Fear makes the Gobball run faster than a Tofu.

name: Clo Res Ko Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one a bit more robust in close combat.

name: Dis Res Tra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one a bit more impervious to projectiles.

name: Walnut Oil
description: Because of its fruity flavour and its low proportion of saturated fatty acids, Walnut Oil is essential in pastry-making and for flavouring cakes. It can be kept in a closed bottle for a few days only.

name: Oilbow Grease
description: This rare type of oil is what we call a mechanical elixir - it lubricates cogs and hinges so well that it only needs to be applied once. A guy by the name of Billy Wanka tried to make everlasting chewing gum with it once, but many, many children perished. Keep it for your hinges.

name: Last Cheeken Feather
description: Beware! You are now the unhappy owner of the last feather from the rump of the last Cheeken in Amakna. It might be a good idea to give it away to a tailor friend... or a Cheeken fanatic. There's a lot of them around lately.

name: Clo Res Tra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one a bit more robust in close combat.

name: Dis Res Ko Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one a bit more impervious to projectiles.

name: Karne Nail
description: This dirty nail, which has been dragged about everywhere, was rescued from the streets. It's up to you to give the appendage a second chance.

name: Karne Tooth
description: What's in your hand is the most ancient game in Amakna. The rules are simple: throw a tooth and try to catch it with the same hand while you pick up another Karne Tooth on the ground.

name: Goblin Skin
description: Goblins often make fun of people, which can be quite irritating. Slicing up those bobbling, wobbling Goblins should shut them up, however.

name: Reworked Treechnid Sap
description: This syrupy sap has been tampered with by a renowned alchemist who wanted to liven up Treechnid Roots. I don't need to tell you that you'll have to be careful with this stuff.

name: Ruby Stone
description: When properly polished, this stone can make a magnificent Ruby.

name: Neutral Res Rune
description: This rune will increase fixed resistance to Neutral damage.

name: Oak Plank
description: A handyman could use this plank to make something delightful - a coffin, for example. Just bear that in mind.

name: Cri Res Rune
description: Inexplicably, you think this rune is a good luck charm. Perhaps it will help you avoid a spell's ill-effects.

name: Royal Gobball Essence
description: This essence contains a part of the immense power of a dungeon keeper: the pick of the litter of monsters in the World of Twelve. Now you just have to find a use befitting such power.

name: Fragment of Stellia's Map 3/3
description: The crafters don't yet know enough about this item for its characteristics to be revealed to potential buyers.

name: Cri Res Ko Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one a bit more unflappable.

name: Sapphire Stone
description: When properly polished, this stone can make a magnificent Sapphire.

name: Royal Gobball Wool
description: This wool is a mixed blessing, really. Soft and light, yet quite fragile, it is simply heaven to scratch with a handful of it. On the other hand, I've seen mental hospitals full of eczema sufferers of sound mind and body who do nothing all day long but scratch, scratch, scratch themselves with this stuff.

name: Exotic Crab Surimi
description: Although a distant relative of the Crab Surimi, this crab has a few brain cells to throw around. This explains its rarity.

name: Fragment of Stellia's Map 1/3
description: The crafters don't yet know enough about this item for its characteristics to be revealed to potential buyers.

name: Fragment of Stellia's Map 2/3
description: The crafters don't yet know enough about this item for its characteristics to be revealed to potential buyers.

name: Proxima
description: Those who leave always take something with them.

name: Cri Res Tra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one a bit more unflappable.

name: Air Res Ko Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one a bit more flexible.

name: Fire Res Tra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one a bit more fireproof.

name: Neutral Res Tra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one a bit less extreme.

name: Fujibakama Leaf
description: Used in a wide variety of miracle cures, this plant is also used to flavour bamboo milk cocktails like fujikoladas and fujitos.

name: Sapphire
description: This precious blue stone is well-adapted to the making of magical weapons, possibly because lazy script writers always use blue to represent mana.

name: Vampiric Liquid
description: This liquid, a blend of several bloods, has the nasty habit of catching in your throat.

name: Key to the Royal Gobball's Court
description: This key allows you to enter the Royal Gobball's Court. Caution: it will be destroyed after use.

name: Crab Surimi
description: This unusually-shaped crab is much appreciated for the great quantity of flesh it yields. It is also the only crab you can catch with a fishing rod because of its natural instinct to cut thread with its claws, which can't cut a thing!

name: Air Res Rune
description: This rune will increase fixed resistance to Air damage.

name: Water Res Rune
description: This rune will increase fixed resistance to Water damage.

name: Earth Res Rune
description: This rune will increase fixed resistance to Earth damage.

name: Pu Res Ko Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one a bit more stable.

name: Earth Res Ko Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one a bit less dirty.

name: Fire Res Ko Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one a bit more fireproof.

name: Neutral Res Ko Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one a bit less extreme.

name: Earth Res Tra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one a bit less dirty.

name: Water Res Tra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one a bit more waterproof.

name: Diamond Stone
description: When properly polished, this stone can make a magnificent Diamond.

name: Crystal Stone
description: When properly polished, this stone can make a magnificent Crystal.

name: Fire Res Rune
description: This rune will increase fixed resistance to Fire damage.

name: Memory Potion
description: This potion allows you to steal part of a being's essence and retain an everlasting memory of your victim's soul. Quite handy for marking your territory or your goods, this potion is often used to create signature runes.

name: Mumussel
description: This beautiful and fresh Mumussel is a great companion to Bworks when they go plundering away from their wives.

name: Psh Res Rune
description: Crampons have appeared on the soles of your shoes, which is very useful if you want to avoid hurting yourself should you slip over. Ridiculous at a ball, however. It's up to you when you use this rune.

name: Contaminated Meat
description: The stench of this meat repels even the most reckless of Moskitos.

name: Contaminated Carrion
description: If you walk around carrying this meat, people will think you just came out of a dump.

name: Water Res Ko Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one a bit more waterproof.

name: Air Res Tra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one a bit more flexible.

name: Emerald Stone
description: When properly polished, this stone can make a magnificent Emerald.

name: Royal Gobball Leather
description: The incredible suppleness of this leather makes it fit for a king, and the web-like cracks are proof of the Royal Gobball longevity. It's the best leather in Amakna.

name: Brandon's Heart
description: This human heart surely comes from the renowned Lhi, who had a passion for Crobaks.

name: Lotus Flower
description: Some say it's the oldest known flower. It symbolises fertility as well as detachment since it can submerge itself in water without getting wet. Some Pandawa Chiefs use this symbol to make their followers understand they have to live their life in the World without falling under its influence.

name: Stellia's Map
description: The crafters don't yet know enough about this item for its characteristics to be revealed to potential buyers.

name: Stellia's Panties
description: The crafters don't yet know enough about this item for its characteristics to be revealed to potential buyers.

name: Pu Res Tra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one a bit more stable.

name: Gobball War Chief Wool
description: This wool smells terrible, but it once belonged to a Gobball War Chief and so is of great sentimental value to warriors.

name: Gobball War Chief Horn
description: Less gentle than many of its kind, the Gobball War Chief skewers Srams and other reckless species with shocking ease. One can often find pieces of fabric on its horns, just like a small trophy on a proud mother's fireplace.

name: Muddy Mushd Heart
description: With their muddy hearts, it's hard to decide where Mushds lie in the food chain. Actually, thinking about it, they're surely right at the very end of the food chain.

name: Mushd Mud
description: The aggressive Mushd is composed of many pieces of mud put together. The only way to get the better of it is to dry it out, which is difficult considering just how moist it is.

name: Acorn
description: Aggressive Arachnees all love Acorns, and everyone – or almost everyone – wonders why.

name: Black Gobball Leather
description: This shining leather is often used by shoemakers and tailors to make small boots and hats.

name: Miliboowolf Hair
description:
This fur is quite the same as the Boowolf's only a little shorter, less robust and softer.
Unfortunately, it smells the same.

name: Piece of Pippin Blop
description: A sizeable piece of Blop.

name: Pippin Blop Flower
description: Say it with Pippin Flowers or don't say it at all!

name: Piece of Indigo Blop
description: A sizeable piece of Blop.

name: Indigo Blop Flower
description: Say it with Indigo Flowers or don't say it at all!

name: Black Gobball Brain
description: Inevitably, the Black Gobball whose brain you removed will be walking strangely for a while.

name: Prespic Tail
description: Thankfully, the Prespic rarely uses its tail, the power of which is really astonishing. Tipsy lumberjacks often report seeing these creatures late at night reducing entire trees to sawdust with a single blow of their appendage.

name: Evil Tofu Feather
description: The Evil Tofu hasn't got many Feathers left. Therefore, he's risking a stinking cold. Don't be surprised if you hear him sneeze at night.

name: Hameres Glove
description: The Hameres use these gloves to protect their fingers from hammer blows.

name: Strubian Sickrat Leather
description: Tanners use this strong leather as their main resource when making boots, belts, masks, and even whips. The only drawback is that it smells like rutting Strubian Sickrat, which won't help you meet people.

name: Evil Tofu Wing
description: This tiny, ridiculous wing is not very useful to the Evil Tofu... the only thing it does is blow hot air to knock Moskitos off balance.

name: Granite Stone
description: This heavy mineral doesn't wear or bend, which limits its usefulness to blacksmiths. It is only in working it for a long period that you will manage to extract some precious stones from it.

name: Squirrol Fabric
description: Under its spines, the Squirrol has a carpet of soft red fur, which gives off a rotten smell on rainy days. Fortunately, it never rains in Amakna… Just don't use this fabric to make your swimming trunks.

name: Black Gobbly Wool
description: Even if tailors don't use it that much, this rough wool is very popular with the Enutrofs, who use it to hide their premature baldness.

name: Babbage
description: The favourite food of herbivores, it's also very good served as a side salad.

name: Sewer Arachnee Leg
description: Eniripsas sometimes use this leg like a needle to sew up wounds. Eniripsas with a sadistic streak, that is.

name: Miliboowolf Scalp
description: When you and the Miliboowolf met, the same thought ran through your warped minds... To leave with a scalp. Well, now you've got a scalp and he needs a hat.

name: Sherpere Helmet
description: Since a Sherpere is never safe from falling rocks, they always leave the house covered.

name: Prespic Peak
description: There's nothing's better than a Prespic Peak for picking your teeth or creating a new arrowhead.

name: Piece of Coco Blop
description: This extract of Blop has a strong smell of coco. How can a monster residue smell like this?

name: Coco Blop Flower
description: Say it with Coco Flowers or don't say it at all!

name: Morello Cherry Blop Flower
description: Say it with Morello Cherry Flowers or don't say it at all!

name: Rat Fang
description: Don't be fooled, these small toothy-pegs are actually real sharp, stinky, used fangs. Sometimes unscrupulous Enutrof dentists replace teeth with them.

name: Army of Ticks
description: According to hunters, a starving Army of Ticks can devour a Gobball's woolly jacket in one night. Some mumbling barflies even assure they can get through the magnificent mane of a Sadida.

name: Strubian Milirat Slices
description: The expression "don't fart around" comes from binmen whose only food was Milirat meat, which is well known to cause intense and spectacular flatulence.

name: Gobbly Horn
description: Gobbly Horns are as shiny and soft as freshly tanned leather. For some unknown reason, Osamodas love them.

name: Darit Hair
description: This hair used to belong to Darit, a young, pretentious wizard who unwisely underestimated his opponent. He forgot to check if the Prespic had cast a Riposte spell before casting 'Ripping Lightning'.

name: Hazelnut
description: When smothered in chocolate, this little Hazelnut is delicious. It's just a shame chocolate's so expensive in Amakna.

name: Piece of Morello Cherry Blop
description: A sizeable piece of Blop.

name: Strubian Raeman Eye
description: In the past, eyes like this one were used to make delicious soup. So delicious, in fact, that the recipe had to be stricken from cookbooks because a goodly number of hunters would take only the eyes, leaving heaps of steaming carcasses everywhere.

name: Gobbly Eye
description: You know how they said that a Gobbly never takes his eye off you?

name: Spadere Eye
description: Stuck to an Al Howin's Day costume, this eye looks remarkably like a cancerous tumour.

name: Twelve Fingeres Ear
description: All your requests to the Twelve Fingeres fell on deaf ears, so you took one of theirs.

name: Goblimp Pattern
description: This pattern can be used by craftsmen to make part of the Goblimp Set.

name: Ra Wis Rune
description: This legendary rune can make anything at all older than the oldest blade.

name: Juvenile Puddle
description: Here's an excellent weapon to use in a water bomb fight.

name: Juvenile Smoke
description: If you collect enough of this smoke, you'll be able to use it to make a screen.

name: Juvenile Ashes
description: If you were hoping to see a Sauroshell be reborn from these ashes, you're going to be waiting a long time.

name: Ra Pow Rune
description: This rune will increase damage dealt to your enemies.

name: Juvenile Powder
description: Young Enutrofs with too much imagination have tried to sell this powder by claiming it's Gourlo's explosive powder. Their scam might have worked too, if they hadn't fallen upon a hungry lion.

name: Sauroshell Egg Yolk
description: The crafters don't yet know enough about this item for its characteristics to be revealed to potential buyers.

name: Minor Oaf
description: Keep your distance.

name: Pow Tra Ra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one much, much more powerful.

name: Ra Tra Per Rune
description: This rune increases your traps' power.

name: Juvenile Mud
description: It seems that, since their business closed down, the confectioners Fer and Ro have had the ingenious idea of drying this mud, leaving pieces of Sauroshell in it, and offering it to the gods of the World of Twelve, claiming that they were the only ones worthy of eating this new 'chocolate'. The story doesn't say what the gods thought of this, but the goddess Eniripsa has been looking a little plumper since then.

name: Blimpristed's Gusset
description: This underpant gusset is squeaky clean and smells like lavender, unlike your own.

name: Pow Ko Ra Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one much, much more powerful.

name: Boar Snout
description: This snout is an essential tool for sniffing out Acorns in the undergrowth. Unlike the Dragon Pig's snout, this one isn't eaten - it has a disgusting stench.

name: Boar Tusk
description: This tusk allows the Boar to protect itself from enemies and, if required, to pick its snout... So don't forget to clean it with warm spring water before grinding it down into a fine powder.

name: Boar Fabric
description: This Boar Hair fabric is rough and foul-smelling... but it offers excellent protection against physical attacks.

name: Dark Miner's Candle
description: Take an Enutrof. When it's dark in the mines, no one can see him. The Dark Miner you took this candle off on the other hand… well, he can't be seen either since you now have his candle.

name: Flib's Cursed Little Box
description: This small chest is shaped like Flib… unless it's the opposite! In any case, it's still a cursed item.

name: Invisible Fabric
description: This fabric once belonged to Mill Burray, hunter of gophers. He spread it out to trap the burrowing creatures and prevent them from tunnelling all over his golf course. The charismatic Captain Chafer took hold of the fabric before disappearing in mysterious circumstances.

name: Minor Payo
description: There'll always be something to unite those who are worlds apart.

name: Strubian Raeman Wool
description: This wool is extremely soft because it comes from a Raeman's down. But be careful: it still smells strongly enough that mother Raemans will be tempted to groom you from head to toe.

name: Strubian Sickrat Mane
description: You'll find it easy to get into "Vee-Eye-Pee" parties with this mane on your head. Unless you bring an Osamodas friend, of course, in which case you'll just be mistaken for their Summons.

name: Dark Rose Petal
description: This petal is used to make expensive perfumes. It gives off a scent of fresh corpse decomposing in lavender, which makes it very popular with Bontarian high society.

name: Invisible Chafer Bone
description: If you close your eyes, scrunch up your face, bunch your fists, stamp your feet and scream until you're sick, you might be able to turn this bone's description invisible, just like the bone itself. Then all that would be left would be the pretty picture, and that's what you like best, because words make your head hurt.

name: Dark Rose Leaf
description: This leaf has the characteristics of both nettles and brambles, which is why loving parents serve it as a salad to their darling little children.

name: Dead Neye
description: You did good picking it up, it's intact. Dead but intact.

name: Minor Kyoub
description: He who underestimates the resistance factor of projectiles when encountering air resistance probably won't make it through winter.

name: Sage
description: This flower is used to make potions with random effects! These effects range from general paralysis to invulnerability to Wabbit flatulence, an old personal favourite.

name: Chestnut Wood
description: The smell of Chestnut Wood sends flies packing. Well, not so much the flies who like Chestnuts... or flies who don't have much of a sense of smell... When you think about it, that probably covers most flies.

name: Draught Potion
description: This sighing potion contains feeble air magic, and can be used to weakly enchant all sorts of items.

name: Walnut Plank
description: A handyman could use this plank to make something delightful - a coffin, for example. Just bear that in mind.

name: Pa Pow Rune
description: This rune will increase damage dealt to your enemies.

name: Pa Prospe Rune
description: This rune will increase your luck in finding rare items.

name: Pow Tra Pa Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one much more powerful.

name: Copper
description: Copper is great for making cheap weapons... It could almost be a substitute for gold... Except it's soft, light, reacts with air and discolours quickly.

name: Plywood Board
description: Worms are stuck to this board like Astrubians around an adventurer throwing their inventory on the ground.

name: Rotten Meat
description: This meat is as full of protein as it is full of maggots.

name: Aluminite
description: This alloy is incredibly light and is consequently a choice metal for small daggers or short swords.

name: Drizzle Potion
description: This rippling potion contains feeble water magic, and can be used to weakly enchant all sorts of items.

name: Tremor Potion
description: This vibrating potion contains feeble earth magic, and can be used to weakly enchant all sorts of items.

name: Trout
description: Trout are easy to catch. Experienced fishermen haul them in by threes.

name: Ancestral Trout
description: This is one of the oldest trout in the World. If the simple passage of time makes you wiser, this trout must be the wisest of all. To be honest, though, that's not what I've heard.

name: Piglet Leather Briefs
description: These very large briefs suit Piglets down to the ground... The seams are stretchy and reinforced for comfort during close attacks. As tradition demands, these briefs must never be washed because they will lose their mystic qualities, which are as yet unknown but feared nonetheless.

name: Sandy Castle Key
description: This key, made of marine waste and sea shells, will grant you access to the beach with the whitest sand of all the Asse Sea Coast.

name: Sponge Mob Skin
description: Either side of this skin can be used for your DIY projects. The soft side is for cleaning delicate surfaces, and the rough side for scouring all your previously inaccessible body parts.

name: Pa Tra Per Rune
description: This rune increases your traps' power.

name: Famished Sunflower Essence
description: This essence contains a part of the immense power of a dungeon keeper: the pick of the litter of monsters in the World of Twelve. Now you just have to find a use befitting such power.

name: Barley
description: If you stare for too long at a Barley plant, you'll begin to see minute flaws in its leaves and stem. Enraged by these imperfections, you'll write a letter to King Allister demanding that something be done about them, and not even a Consolation Candy will calm your ire.

name: Muddy Trout
description: The Muddy Trout is somehow related to the aggressive Salmoon of Moon Island. This trout is delicious both raw and cooked…

name: Gutted Unique Kralove
description: This Unique Kralove can now be used as an ingredient.

name: Gold-Bearing Oats
description: When we look at this kind of oats we get the impression that the grains are covered with gold, the sign of the great magic power that is absorbed during sprouting.

name: Bambooto Plank
description: A handyman could use this plank to make something delightful - a coffin, for example. Just bear that in mind.

name: Magic Famished Sunflower Petal
description: Just like any magical item, this one is impressive. The petal emits an aura that is as powerful as the incredulity of any onlookers.

name: Divine Sage
description: The soothsayers who abuse this distilled plant claim to have foreseen their death: choking on their own vomit, in a gutter.

name: Chestnut Sap
description: Sap has numerous uses, but lumberjacks have always preferred using it to make Yule Logs.

name: Pow Ko Pa Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one much more powerful.

name: Spark Potion
description: This warming potion contains feeble fire magic, and can be used to weakly enchant all sorts of items.

name: Pa Wis Rune
description: This powerful rune can make the oldest of blades older.

name: Magic Orange Dye
description: This small magic potion gives a magnificent auburn glow when applied to any kind of hair. Oh, and it seems to have a few magical powers as well.

name: Gutted Kralove
description: This Kralove can now be used as an ingredient.

name: Sweet Barley
description: This rare type of barley absorbed sweet rainwater during its germination phase, which accounts for its incomparable magical powers.

name: Shrubstrate
description: These shrubs are very much appreciated when the need arises to do a somersault or relieve a pressing need.

name: Rotten Carrion
description: It’s not the size of this meat that matters, but the delightful smell of decaying flesh.

name: Gobball Blood
description: This stuff doubles as bait and weapon. You attract the creatures of the wild with the smell of the stuff, then when it turns all scabby, you use it to knock them over the head.

name: Gobball Wool
description: This thick wool smells like Bwork BO, but it's so thick and warm that you forgive it even that. It's also hypoallergenic, which is why Eniripsas everywhere use it to knit underwear out of.

name: Orange Larva Skin
description: This delightfully smooth skin is an excellent ingredient for magic potions.

name: Wild Sunflower Petal
description: This petal moves according to the sun. If you put it in your right pocket in the morning, you'll find it in your left pocket in the evening.

name: Glacial Fluid
description: Glacial Fluid, which is much loved by practical jokers, is also useful for cooling down the rampant ardour of randy Wabbits and Dragostesses with a little too much fire in their bellies.

name: Sunflower Seed
description: This protein-rich seed gives a peculiar taste and smell to loaves of bread.

name: Mush Mush Thorn
description: This venomous thorn protects the Mush Mush in close combat, but, tragically, also means the creature cannot give hugs without killing the hugee. For more important matters, the Mush Mush uses Sporm to reproduce, firing it at his partner from far away.

name: Yellow Larva Skin
description: This delightfully smooth skin is an excellent ingredient for magic potions.

name: Fertiliser
description: Any beautiful plant needs Fertiliser. That's why ageing Enutrofettes don't need it.

name: Poppy Seed
description: This seed imparts hallucinogenic properties to bread, ideal for a well-earned brain-holiday after a hard day's fighting.

name: Evil Dandelion Flower
description: This flower loses its toxic properties when properly boiled and dried, and can be consumed in a herbal tea, but it is mainly used to entertain youths in search of romance. Indeed, who has never blown an Evil Dandelion Flower down the neck of a coveted lover? Such beautiful seeds, sweet as the touch of a shaft of sunlight on the dew-damp leaves of a charm tree. Perhaps Iops, who, instead of blowing, tend to suck the seeds and choke miserably in terrible convulsions.

name: Moskito Wings
description: These delicate wings have a very distinctive feature – anyone who dares to chew on them will gain spectacular powers of concentration. As a result, they're mainly used to make wisdom potions, and if you chew enough, you'll be able to spot a misplaced apostrophe on a Wanted notice in Astrub at fifty paces.

name: Silk String
description: The delicacy and suppleness of this string is hard to beat. Silk is the fabric favoured by the Chafers for their fighting underwear.

name: Blue Larva Skin
description: This delightfully smooth skin is an excellent ingredient for magic potions.

name: Mush Mush Sporm
description: This Sporm is the "precious seed" that allows the Mush Mush to scatter its angry mob wherever it wants, which is everywhere, basically. Be careful, however, as smelly feet and the smell of Bowisse's Boots attract the Sporms.

name: Wild Grass
description: This type of vegetation is used for bedding in Gobball pens. It certainly is a wild species - it often flees of its own accord. Polite too, though. It always closes the gate after it. Quite spectacular, just great.

name: Marine Conch
description: If you lift this conch to your ear and listen, you'll hear the roar of the ocean. If you lift this conch to your mouth and blow, you'll hear the roar of the militiamen who have come to arrest you for bursting everyone's eardrums.

name: Suntan Lotion
description: Some people claim that a suntan is a sign of good health. Others disagree with this plainly preposterous notion, but not for long, because the goddess Peasbwin likes to shut them up. Halcyon days if you've got leathery, burnt skin!

name: Worm-Ridden Wood
description: There's fewer traces of worms in this wood than in your mount's posterior.

name: Green Larva Skin
description: This delightfully smooth skin is an excellent ingredient for magic potions.

name: Arachnee Leg
description: In spite of its magical properties, this thin, hairy leg is in short supply - alchemists use it to pat their faces after shaving and never have enough left to sell... Like my mother always said... Don't get dry off your own supply.

name: Scarecro Tongue
description: This tongue is green due to its owner's excessive consumption of Mint Jelly… Can you imagine how much jelly you have to eat to turn that colour?

name: Ancestral Cotton
description: This cotton is as soft as the belly fur of a young female Ecaflip, as white as a spring cloud and as delicate as a Tofu feather.

name: Magic Arachnee Leg
description: This Arachnee Leg is different from the rest - it moves on its own and seems to be well and truly alive, even when amputated from its owner. It could be on the point of starting a family since apparently it is attracted to sewing tools.

name: Wild Sunflower Leaf
description: Somewhat bizarrely, the fleshy, spiny leaves of the Wild Sunflower are also its feet - so don't be surprised if this one smells a little cheesy.

name: Slimy Scale
description: This slimy, slippery scale allowed its owner to escape capture by strange adventurers who fished with their teeth. Unfortunately, it was no use against the well-placed swipe of a rusty sword.

name: Beach Towel
description: This towel can be used for beach tanning, rubbing down sandy-skinned Sadidas or soaking up Ecaflip gambling debts. It's so absorbant it would also make a great mop.

name: Prize Fin
description: Some years ago, swimmers participating in the Krozolympiks decided to fix Snapper fins onto their swimming costumes to improve their performance. Following a rather painful accident where one of the athletes put on his trunks the wrong way around, this technique has been strictly forbidden. All those who want to break the rules, go get changed!

name: Minor Domo
description: Generally speaking, spreading out is a horrible tactic. It's almost as bad as sticking together.

name: Demonic Rose Saliva
description: This furious rose has habit of slobbering rabidly on whoever approaches it... They say it's a sign of affection!

name: Demonic Rose Petal
description: These petals are a powerful aphrodisiac, which makes them the ideal present to win over your beloved. Just one thing… it's better not to brew them into tea, as drinking it would have the opposite effect.

name: Crystaloball Stone
description: It takes the patience of a saint but this stone can become round and bright like the pompom on a magic hat. Its shape makes it easy to fit almost anywhere.

name: Luigie Mushroom
description: This great hero was turned into a mushroom thanks to the bumbling magic of the mischievous Soft Oak. Being complete cretins, the Mush Mushes venerate and protect him as one of their gods.

name: Magic Greenish Dye
description: This small magic potion gives hair a magnificent greenish effect. Oh, and it seems to have a few magical powers.

name: Pow Tra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one a bit more powerful.

name: Tra Per Rune
description: This rune will increase the power of your traps.

name: Pow Ko Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one a bit more powerful.

name: Prospe Rune
description: This rune will increase your luck in finding rare items.

name: Minor Yosh
description: …then I took an arrow to the heart.

name: Wis Rune
description: This small rune can make the oldest blades even older.

name: Pow Rune
description: This rune will increase damage dealt to your enemies.

name: Pink Piwi Feather
description: This Piwi feather was taken from the butt of a hapless Piwi.

name: Sickly Skin
description: Beneath this slimy exterior, a very precious artefact lies. It will bring you the luck of the devil himself, provided you wear it round your head... You'll have the temper of a devil too with this wet rag clinging to your skull.

name: Green Piwi Feather
description: This Piwi feather was taken from the butt of a hapless Piwi.

name: Tofu Beak
description: Don't trust the ridiculously tiny appearance of this Tofu Beak; it's well-sharpened. The archers of Amakna have used them as arrowheads since the beginning of time.

name: Sick Arachnee Hairs
description: Boar Hair is naturally tapered and so ideal for making brushes and brooms. Some people develop serious allergies to Boar Hair, so always rub softly and infrequently.

name: Yellow Piwi Feather
description: This Piwi feather was taken from the butt of a hapless Piwi.

name: Minor Petunia
description: The harder you are, the bigger you fall.

name: Moskito Eyebrows
description: The Moskito has long, thin eyebrows that set off its irresistible good looks just perfectly.

name: Araknoxious Intestine
description: This stem, as flexible and solid as a teachers cane, is THE choice material in the making of whips and other disciplinary implements, which are essential in the successful upbringing of children and to a healthy, open relationship between consenting adults.

name: Blue Piwi Feather
description: This Piwi feather was taken from the butt of a hapless Piwi.

name: Red Piwi Feather
description: This Piwi feather was taken from the butt of a hapless Piwi.

name: Purple Piwi Feather
description: This Piwi feather was taken from the butt of a hapless Piwi.

name: Arachmutated Eye
description: This disturbing but intriguing eye doesn't really reflect what you'd expect it to. For example, if you look into it, instead of your reflection you'll see your counterpart, your Dopple. Go figure.

name: Bright Sack of Potatoes
description: A Rogue carried incredible quantities of peeled potatoes in this sack and then sold them to prisoners. When he died, his bag passed down from Rogue to Rogue as a family ritual.

name: Dark Sack of Potatoes
description: The Dark Sack of Potatoes is identical to the Bright Sack of Potatoes apart from the fact that it has been dipped in some Dark Treechnid sap, thus conferring still more powers upon it.

name: Wild Sunflower Oil
description: This oil is highly recommended by dieticians because of its high proportion of essential, unsaturated and polyunsaturated fatty acids…

name: Ra Stre Rune
description: This legendary rune can make anything at all sharper than the sharpest of blades.

name: Ra Pod Rune
description: This rune will make equipment lighter.

name: Ra Ini Rune
description: This rune puts you one step ahead of your enemies and lets you anticipate their reactions.

name: Field Dungeon Key
description: This key will let you into the Famished Sunflower's Barn. It won't let you out again, though.

name: Sponge Mob Essence
description: This essence contains a part of the immense power of a dungeon keeper: the pick of the litter of monsters in the World of Twelve. Now you just have to find a use befitting such power.

name: Int Tra Ra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one much, much more intelligent.

name: Agi Tra Ra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one much, much more agile.

name: Rose of the Sands
description: It's not red, but at least it won't wilt.

name: Fragment of Akornaddikt's Map 1/2
description: The crafters don't yet know enough about this item for its characteristics to be revealed to potential buyers.

name: Akornaddikt's Map
description: The crafters don't yet know enough about this item for its characteristics to be revealed to potential buyers.

name: Cha Ko Ra Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one much, much luckier.

name: Stre Tra Ra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one much, much stronger.

name: Cha Tra Ra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one much, much luckier.

name: Pod Tra Ra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one much, much more grabby.

name: Hemp Seed
description: Hemp Seeds are used to calm down herds of Tabis during the rutting season. All you need to do is toss these seeds on their grazing ground and they'll instantly become less savage.

name: Ra Int Rune
description: This legendary rune can make anything at all brighter than the brightest of blades.

name: Gutted Small Sandy Carp
description: This Small Sandy Carp can now be used as an ingredient.

name: Gutted Pike
description: This Pike can now be used as an ingredient.

name: Fragment of Akornaddikt's Map 2/2
description: The crafters don't yet know enough about this item for its characteristics to be revealed to potential buyers.

name: Kardorim's Skull
description: This magnificent skull will look wonderful on your coffee table - a souvenir of a battle from your days as a young adventurer. However, be careful that it doesn't devour your meal when you turn your back on it.

name: Ini Tra Ra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one much, much more of an instigator.

name: Grawn
description: Grawns are appreciated for their delicate taste and bright pink colour. On the other hand, they are hated for their legendary bad temper and their gomina-style antennae.

name: Ra Cha Rune
description: This powerful rune can make the most attractive weapons even more attractive.

name: Magic Dark Dye
description: This small magic potion gives hair a magnificent dark colour. Oh, and it seems to have a few magical powers.

name: Gutted Ediem Carp
description: This Ediem Carp can now be used as an ingredient.

name: Chestnut Plank
description: A handyman could use this plank to make something delightful - a coffin, for example. Just bear that in mind.

name: Tourmaline
description: Tons of Enutrofs have sold their parents for their weight in Tourmaline.

name: Akornaddikt Acorn
description: Akornaddikt got this at his first Acorn Addicts Anonymous meeting.

name: Ground Meat
description: Only an artist, a real expert with a knife, a veteran cutter could cut this meat in this way. Pray you never meet them.

name: Ethereal Carrion
description: This meat can barely be touched, which makes it tricky to cook for a beginner hunter.

name: Int Ko Ra Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one much, much more intelligent.

name: Agi Ko Ra Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one much, much more agile.

name: Vi Tra Ra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one much, much more lively.

name: Element Flask
description: This Flask is especially designed for capturing elementary essences.

name: Ra Vit Rune
description: This rune can make the most sturdy weapons even more resistant.

name: Ra Agi Rune
description: This legendary rune can make the lightest weapons even lighter.

name: Horror Grawn
description: Transformation of the Grawn. A distinguishing characteristic of this rare species is that it makes nauseating grunting noises when it moves around.

name: Gutted Tupe-Halett Pike
description: This Tupe-Halett Pike can now be used as an ingredient.

name: Hunting Rune
description:
In the words of Lezan the Wise - "Well, bad hunters just see something, right, and then they shoot it like. And then though, good hunter, like, see something and shoot it. Good hunters."
You can check if all this is true with this rune.

name: Kerub Hair
description: No, this isn't Bow Meow hair, but Ecaflip hair. And not just any Ecaflip... It grew on the illustrious Kerub Crepin himself. It's highly unlikely that he'll be asking for it back so it's completely up to you to decide what you want to do with it.

name: Kardorim Essence
description: This essence contains a part of the immense power of a dungeon keeper: the pick of the litter of monsters in the World of Twelve. Now you just have to find a use befitting such power.

name: Stre Ko Ra Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one much, much stronger.

name: Jade Hammer Head
description: If you're moderately talented, you can probably craft a replica of Hargnok the Smasher's hammer with this piece of green stone. Then you could have the pleasure of smashing your adversaries' heads in with a legendary weapon.

name: Gobball Slobber
description: This infection-ridden slobber smells so bad because Gobballs never stop licking their filthy wool, which also gives Gobballs atrociously bad breath. A vicious circle.

name: Minor Nyoro
description: It's said that it can hypnotize, but no one's really clear how or why it would do that.

name: Pa Pod Rune
description: This rune will make equipment lighter.

name: Aminita Volva
description: If you're asking what a volva is, you must be a man.

name: Int Ko Pa Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one much more intelligent.

name: Stre Ko Pa Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one much stronger.

name: Pa Agi Rune
description: This powerful rune can make the lightest of weapons lighter.

name: Int Tra Pa Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one much more intelligent.

name: Stre Tra Pa Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one much stronger.

name: Pa Int Rune
description: This powerful rune can make the brightest of weapons brighter.

name: Agi Tra Pa Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one much more agile.

name: Vi Tra Pa Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one much more lively.

name: Pa Stre Rune
description: This powerful rune can make the sharpest of blades sharper.

name: Pa Ini Rune
description: This rune puts you one step ahead of your enemies and lets you anticipate their reactions.

name: Agi Ko Pa Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one much more agile.

name: Cha Ko Pa Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one much luckier.

name: Pod Tra Pa Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one much more grabby.

name: Chafer Bone
description: This almost unbreakable bone becomes soft in contact with water, which makes things much easier for alchemists.

name: Pa Vit Rune
description: This powerful rune can increase an item's Vitality bonus.

name: Pa Cha Rune
description: This powerful rune can make the most attractive weapons even more attractive.

name: Incarnam Relic
description: If the legend is to be believed, these relics have the power to bring the dead back to life. However, seeing the Incarnam Chafers, some doubts are normal.

name: Cha Tra Pa Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one much luckier.

name: Ini Tra Pa Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one much more of an instigator.

name: Spiritabby Tail
description: Worn as a scarf or used as a whip, this tail has quite a few uses in expert hands.

name: Minor Behelit
description: He who seeks only to dominate their adversaries dies with a collar around his neck.

name: Celestial Wool
description: This Celestial Wool will certainly keep you covered, but its transparent nature can be somewhat troublesome, especially if you have something to hide.

name: Translucent Petal
description: If you're thinking of making a hat with these petals to protect you from the sun, well… good luck.

name: Lottery Ticket
description: Between your fat little fingers you're greedily clutching a superb Lottery Ticket. Hold on to it. You might be the lucky winner at the great draw!

name: Gloot Skin
description: Much like a water balloon, this skin contains all the water Gloots need to survive. If you want to be rid of it, you'll only need a needle.

name: Wheat Flour
description: This flour is obtained by grinding grains of wheat. It is an essential ingredient in the making of bread, pancakes, waffles and delicious cakes, but is mainly used for silly children's games.

name: Baker's Yeast
description: Yeast is an essential ingredient for making bread rise.

name: Iron
description: Iron is essential to blacksmiths and anyone else who works with metal. Some logical creatures even use it for ironing.

name: Peeled Potatoes
description: These potatoes are peeled, which makes them even more sumptuous.

name: Black Paint
description: You can paint anything with this can of paint: your house, your Tofu pet, your friends or even yourself…

name: Moon Island Ticket
description:
Destination: Heavenly Island
Cost: 1,000 kamas
Ticket: One-way

name: Bow Meow Grass
description: This plant will make the mouth of an Ecaflip water.

name: Walnut Shell
description: Naturally resistant to all kind of aggressions, this shell symbolises the Feca ideology.

name: Flexible Wood
description: With its flexible and curvilinear shape, this big wooden branch makes you immediately think of Cras.

name: Old Four-Leaf Clover
description: Four-leaf clovers are rarer than five-leaf ones. So when you find one, you should rub it dry between two spell scrolls.

name: Sulphur Pouch
description: This little pouch of sulphur gives off an unbearable smell. The same smell as an Osamodas, come to think of it.

name: Green Triam Metaria
description: This strange-looking sphere seems to contain a tiny gust of wind in its centre.

name: Red Triam Metaria
description: This strange-looking sphere seems to contain a tiny inferno in its centre.

name: Bony Montana
description: "Who wants a little bone from his mummy-wummy?" Those were the last words of a proud Enutrof woman who mistook the Boowolf for her trusty poodle.

name: Dose of Tasty Juice
description: A dose of tasty juice, sometimes known as chef's special sauce, will make a fine, rustic, slightly salty broth.

name: Terrine
description:
Terrine is like meat… Oooo, that hits the spot. Three cheers for the terrine! Hurrah for the terrine!!!
Go terrine, it's your birthday.
Go terrine, it's your birthday.
(Extract from the butcher anthem, verse 4)

name: Gutted Crab Surimi
description: This Crab Surimi can now be used as an ingredient.

name: Gudgeon
description: A small and fast-moving freshwater fish, the gudgeon is often caught by children and novice fishermen. Don't expect to feed your family with it.

name: Gutted Kiye Gudgeon
description: This Kiye Gudgeon can now be used as an ingredient.

name: Frying Oil
description: What have Astrubian chips and Bontarian motorcycles got in common? This stuff.

name: Spices
description: Rosemary was always late delivering packages. This prompted the head of International Herbs & Spices to call her supervisor, demanding to speak to the parcel sage about Rosemary and time.

name: Golden Wheat Flour
description: This flour was made with an ear of Golden Wheat. Awesome!

name: Contest Snapper
description: This fish can only be caught in the Sufokia Schwimming Pool. It is a cross breed of many diverse fish.

name: Banana
description: The famous minstrel Jon Lemon once composed an ode to this fruit: "Happiness is a warm Banana".

name: Aubergine
description: This isn't the most nutritious of vegetables and it often requires strong seasoning to make it a bit more tasty. In spite of its bad reputation, however, it's really quite healthy. Well, healthy for everyone except Bworks. No one knows why, however.

name: Stuffed Sadida Dopple
description:
This stuffed toy has a big alarm clock in its stuffing, very useful for Sadidas who find it hard to wake up. It's best left behind when you fall under a charm, though, since time has a way of getting away from you!
(This stuffed toy is only good as a collector's item.)

name: Stuffed Sram Dopple
description:
This stuffed toy was stolen from a young Sram who stole it from one of his friends…
(This stuffed toy is only good as a collector's item.)

name: Stuffed Eniripsa Dopple
description:
This stuffed toy could almost fly on its own if its wings weren't worn down. Indeed, this toy is far from new. But no matter: it's still a nice gift.
(This stuffed toy is only good as a collector's item.)

name: Stuffed Enutrof Dopple
description:
This stuffed toy is rumoured to be stuffed with bauxite and golden nuggets – at least that's what they say on the black market… In reality, it's just ordinary gravel.
(This stuffed toy is only good as a collector's item.)

name: Stuffed Feca Dopple
description:
This stuffed toy is almost indestructible, so it's perfect for young, unruly, careless Fecas.
(This stuffed toy is only good as a collector's item.)

name: Stuffed Prespic
description:
This stuffed Prespic has no thorns and can't turn itself invisible, but it's a good stuffed toy and will make all your friends terribly jealous.
(This stuffed toy is only good as a collector's item.)

name: Stuffed Dragon Pig
description:
This stuffed toy is unique. But be careful, it's only suitable for an… experienced… audience.
(This stuffed toy is only good as a collector's item.)

name: Lord Crow's Cup-and-Ball
description: This magnificent toy once belonged to Lord Crow. Too stupid to understand how it worked, he used it to crush his little crows. Everyone has a right to a pastime.

name: Red Balloon
description: This balloon is a souvenir from the Trool Fair.

name: Yellow Balloon
description: This balloon is a souvenir from the Trool Fair.

name: Fake Quaquack
description: Don't trust it, it's a fake Quaquack. Give it to Skroo Gee - he's near the Duck Stall. You will be rewarded.

name: Ini Rune
description: This rune puts you one step ahead of your enemies and lets you anticipate their reactions.

name: Stuffed Sacrier Dopple
description:
This stuffed toy is just perfect for young Sacriers. It's great for mopping up blood and can even be washed at high temperatures.
(This stuffed toy is only good as a collector's item.)

name: Snoowolf Skin
description: Slightly curly, this skin will make a wonderful bedside rug. I'm sure someone around Incarnam will want it. You just have to find out who it is…

name: Piece of Goldemort
description: Congratulations! You managed to steal a piece of Goldemort's corpse. You'd make a vulture proud!

name: Enutrof Skull
description: This trophy was already old before it became a trophy.

name: Iop Skull
description: This trophy is as empty now as it was when it was alive.

name: Cra Skull
description: This cute Cra skull appears to have been fetched out of a recent archaeological dig.

name: Sacrier Skull
description: This bragging Sacrier, with his 6000HP, isn't so smug now, is he?

name: Tofu Pheromone
description: This dehydrated, powdered pheromone can attract a Tofu from several kilokametres away, as long as your own pheromones don't asphyxiate it first.

name: Firestone
description: This stone is elemental energy, solidified and concentrated.

name: Airstone
description: This stone is elemental energy, solidified and concentrated.

name: Black Stone of Vulkania
description: This stone is as black as a Trool's underpants. Luckily for your entourage, it doesn't give off the same smell. So you can't use it as an excuse to explain that nauseating stench that lingers around you.

name: Holiday-maker Jam
description: This jam contains the vitamin-filled, spiced food that is associated with Vulkania Island. The package carries a somewhat unsettling warning though: May contain clothing.

name: Goblimp Joke
description: If you're a fan of fine dining and bad jokes, be prepared to let out a little whine.

name: Ribbum Wrapping Paper
description: This wrapping paper will allow you to create a beautiful gift package. You just need to decide who to give it to!

name: Foggernaut Skull
description: The crafters don't yet know enough about this item for its characteristics to be revealed to potential buyers.

name: Internal Fire
description: After years of meditation, you might be able to reveal your inner fire. If you don't want to wait, you can also bump off a few Spirit Fires.

name: Intangible Meat
description: Taken from moribund animals or bodiless spirits, this meat is rather strange. It's said it's the result of an experiment by Tajonoo… The god of insipidity would particularly appreciate its bland taste.

name: Enriched Croquette
description: Your pets will absolutely love this extra-nutritious kibble.

name: Ebony Dofus Replica
description: Rotceres have flooded the market with thousands of these replicas, so don't expect this one to fetch a good price.

name: Stre Tra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one a bit stronger.

name: Blue Paint
description: I'm blue, da ba dee da ba die.

name: Green Paint
description: Give it the green light.

name: Legendary Astral Rune
description: When Twelvians' dreams come together, dreamlike thoughts crystallise and form an astral rune. The incredible adventure that engendered this one is still told throughout the Krosmoz.

name: Damaged Book
description: This book from the Amakna library has clearly seen better days. But the damage isn't irreversible, with the right materials and know-how, it could be restored to its former glory.

name: Katana Blade
description: Well, it's something, but you'll have a hard time fighting with just this bit as your weapon.

name: Wheat
description: Since the beginning of time, Wheat has been the staple food of Amakna's inhabitants and Tofus.

name: Drinking Water
description: Water is useful for many things. Make sure it's stagnant and cloudy for maximum taste when brewing beer.

name: Flax String
description: With this very sturdy Flax String, you can choose to either make nice, solid seams or to bind your friends' hands and feet to show them who the real guild leader is.

name: Nettles
description: On each of her birthdays, it's local custom to throw grandma into a field of this plant.

name: Magical Cure
description: Some bakers tried to create this powder by mixing Flax Seed and bread, but the result was far from satisfying. The real Magic Cure is produced by wild flowers, and its nature remains a mystery.

name: Barley Flour
description: This flour is milled from Barley grains. It gives a certain lightness to the centre of the bread which has no equal in the land, unless you use occult magic in your bakery.

name: Broken Wings
description: Looking at these broken wings makes you realise just how badly you wanted to stay in bed this morning.

name: Urtica
description: Rapidly rubbing this plant on your skin will make you suffer torture but the stimulation produces beneficial effects… well, that's what Sacriers say at least.

name: Bluebells
description: Bluebells are very small, delicate and attractive. On top of that, some say they have the power to calm down spirits and cure some illnesses. They were probably created by a divinity who wanted a plant in the image of the Eniripsas.

name: Everlasting Flower
description: This strange little plant grows in arid environments and gives off a smell of curry. It seems it can resist ageing. If only all this could be said for women.

name: 5,000 Kek Coupon
description:
Something is written on this piece of paper:
"Congratulations! You are now the proud owner of a KeK coupon, which proves that you are a great adventurer. Come see us, we are waiting for you!"
Map coordinates -1,-2

name: Vit Rune
description: This small rune can make the most resistant weapon even more resistant.

name: Agi Rune
description: This small rune can make the lightest of weapons lighter.

name: Yellow Triam Metaria
description: This strange-looking sphere seems to contain a tiny mound of earth in its centre.

name: Red Mage Metaria
description: This strange-looking sphere seems to contain a tiny explosion in its centre.

name: Green Mage Metaria
description: This strange-looking sphere seems to contain a tiny cyclone in its centre.

name: Bowl
description: There's nothing more convenient than a bowl to eat your soup properly, even if the fact of eating properly doesn't alter the taste. Unless your fingers are really dirty.

name: Cherry
description: Xelors often mistake this fruit for a space hopper. Remember them!

name: Lemon
description: This juice of this fruit is perfect for hiding the foul smell of rotting flesh. A must-have if you're serving leftovers to your guests.

name: Trool Fair Token
description: You bought this token from Leonzi Trool. His humble dream is to open the biggest public fair ever seen.

name: Gutted Kittenfish
description: This Kittenfish can now be used as an ingredient.

name: Gutted Horror Grawn
description: This Horror Grawn can now be used as an ingredient.

name: Gutted Trout
description: This Trout can now be used as an ingredient.

name: Golden Wheat
description: This wheat contains a powerful magic.

name: Bright Hop Flour
description: This flour was made with Bright Hops. It contains magical energy for sure!

name: Storm Flax Flour
description: This flour has been made with Storm Flax. It probably has the same properties of resistance.

name: Orange
description: They say that oranges are not the only fruit.

name: Liquid Heavy Metal Potion
description: This potion gives reality back to an ethereal blade.

name: Stuffed Xelor Dopple
description:
This stuffed toy makes a strange noise. It seems to have a clock in its stuffed head, a kind of lullaby to lull young Xelors off to sleep.
(This stuffed toy is only good as a collector's item.)

name: Dark Vlad's Rattle
description: This ordinary Rattle once belonged to Dark Vlad, which is enough to make it priceless.

name: Captain Chafer's Skipping Rope
description: Captain Chafer used that skipping rope to keep his finger joints in shape. Since he disappeared from Amakna, it's been passing from hand to hand.

name: Trool Fair Snow Globe
description: This nice snow globe will be right at home on a mantelpiece.

name: Bean
description: Planting this bean won't let you get to the land of the giants. However, eating it with your back to a fire might create a big enough explosion to get you there.

name: Moumouse
description: This Moumouse was driven out of Grandma's house with a broom.

name: Water Pandawushu Artefact
description: This magic artefact is used by the Pandawushu disciples to enchant their equipment.

name: Wind Pandawushu Artefact
description: This magic artefact is used by the Pandawushu disciples to bewitch their equipment.

name: Rock Pandawushu Artefact
description: This magic artefact is used by the Pandawushu disciples to enchant their equipment.

name: Kardorim's Crypt Key
description: This key allows you access to Kardorim's Crypt. Kardorim is one of the toughest Chafers in Incarnam.

name: Feca Skull
description: This Feca skull will make a perfect bookend, if you can stop the moans escaping from it.

name: Rogue Skull
description: You won't be blown away by this Rogue Skull. There's nothing astonishing about it either.

name: Sauroshell Figurine
description: This figure is an excellent way of attracting dust to your desk. If you're as short on conscience as you are on cash, you can always sell it on to a tribe of Sauroshell simpletons.

name: Wedding Wrapping Paper
description: This wrapping paper will allow you to create a beautiful gift package. You just need to decide who to give it to!

name: Corruption Wrapping Paper
description: This wrapping paper will allow you to create a beautiful gift package. You just need to decide who to give it to!

name: Surprise Wrapping Paper
description: This wrapping paper will allow you to create a beautiful gift package. You just need to decide who to give it to!

name: Mysterious Fabric
description: This fabric is uncommonly slinky and elastic. The most foolish rumours say it has supernatural powers, like making you temporarily forget your in-laws or picking up the kids at school for an entire week. Which explains why it's used to make "powerful" equipment.

name: Ferrite
description: This strange alloy is created by novice miners as practise.

name: Ash Sap
description: Sap has numerous uses, but lumberjacks have always preferred using it to make Yule Logs.

name: Huppermage Skull
description: The crafters don't yet know enough about this item for its characteristics to be revealed to potential buyers.

name: Whetstone
description: Thou shalt not cast the first stone.

name: Emerald Dofus Replica
description: Rotceres have flooded the market with thousands of these replicas, so don't expect this one to fetch a good price.

name: Turquoise Dofus Replica
description: Rotceres have flooded the market with thousands of these replicas, so don't expect this one to fetch a good price.

name: Cha Tra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one a bit luckier.

name: Vi Tra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one a bit more lively.

name: Purple Paint
description: So lush and royal.

name: Minor Astral Rune
description: When Twelvians' dreams come together, dreamlike thoughts crystallise and form an astral rune. Small gestures may seem inconsequential, but they sometimes make an impression upon people's hearts. It's one of those small gestures that produced this rune.

name: Damaged Fabric
description: Once this fabric has been patched, it will be sent to Misery's warehouses.

name: Patching Tool
description: The Miserites use this kit to patch up pieces of cloth found in the desert.

name: Rice Oil
description: If you need something greasy, this oil will do the job nicely.

name: Flax Seed
description: This minute seed contains lots of goodness and plenty of flavour. Kwak hunters use these glistening seeds to lure the dozy creatures into traps.

name: Hop Flour
description: This flour lends a delicious beer-like taste to the bread, without having to waste any beer in the process. What a skilled bunch these bakers are, don't you think?

name: Bottle of Rum
description: The label says '10 year old rum' but it is quite impossible to check if it tells the truth. Don't drink it excessively on the road for fear of seasickness.

name: Glass Bowl
description: This bowl is multipurpose! It can be used for making potions as well as for drowning fish.

name: 1,000 Kek Coupon
description:
Something is written on this piece of paper:
"Congratulations! You are now the proud owner of a KeK coupon, which proves that you are a great adventurer. Come see us, we are waiting for you!"
Map coordinates -1,-2

name: Blue Metaria
description: This strange-looking sphere seems to contain a tiny puddle in its centre.

name: Gutted Breaded Fish
description: The breaded fish can now be used as an ingredient.

name: Gutted Ancestral Trout
description: This Ancestral Trout can now be used as an ingredient.

name: Pepper Measure
description: Ground pepper is an essential ingredient of mashed potatoes. Forget it at your peril.

name: Eternal Ashes
description: This is all that's left of an unfortunate soul who crossed your path. The creature made the mistake of thinking that being non-corporeal meant they could escape you. Their naiveté makes you smile.

name: Resistant Rye Flour
description: This flour retains all the characteristics of Resisting Rye. Excessive consumption can therefore have chronic laxative effects.

name: Pear
description: This juicy Lolwut pear is made of win.

name: Kweats's Card
description: This card is linked to Master Kweats. That's all you'll ever know and all you need to know.

name: Liquid Precious Metal Potion
description: This potion gives a great deal of reality back to an ethereal blade.

name: Stuffed Royal Gobball
description:
This stuffed toy is royally good; from the seams to the stuffing, nothing's been left to chance. It's an excellent gift for spoilt children or rich brats.
(This stuffed toy is only good as a collector's item.)

name: Stuffed Ecaflip Dopple
description:
This stuffed toy amuses Ecaflips of all ages.
(This stuffed toy is only good as a collector's item.)

name: Stuffed Cra Dopple
description:
This proud-looking stuffed toy is made to be hurled onto your playmates, as a kind of boomerang that doesn't come back.
(This stuffed toy is only good as a collector's item.)

name: Green Balloon
description: This balloon is a souvenir from the Trool Fair.

name: Stuffed Boowolf
description:
This magnificent stuffed toy with real Boowolf hairs will keep you warm at night and fill your bedroom with the pleasant smell of dead Boowolf sweat.
(This stuffed toy is only good as a collector's item.)

name: Stuffed Pandawa Dopple
description:
This stuffed toy smells like alcohol and wet Pandawa hair… just like mummy.
(This stuffed toy is only good as a collector's item.)

name: Eniripsa Skull
description: Don't be cruel, this isn't a sparrow's skull!

name: Sadida Skull
description: What? There's actually a skull underneath that huge thatch of hair?

name: Still Water
description: This water, kept in an unstable state of supercooling, is mainly used to instantly freeze any type of food. Some unscrupulous Frigostians say it also works very well with mothers-in-law.

name: Waterstone
description: This stone is elemental energy, solidified and concentrated.

name: Plastic Heart
description: This fake Sauroshell Heart has two uses. Children can fill in with Lousy Pig blood and use it as a water pistol by pointing the false artery at the target and squeezing it. As for the parents, this heart can be a welcome reminder of the heat on Vulkania Island when they're trembling from cold on Kwismas Island.

name: Lyfflongen-Pross Pebble
description:
This crystal is very popular amongst adventurers and, in particular, Enutrofs because of the blessing it has been bestowed with. Some people claim it was made by the protector of Junssidor, Sumens, himself, which would explain its powerful magic.
Nevertheless, some less gullible academics claim it's a rip-off, also known as a tourist-trap.

name: Congratulations Wrapping Paper
description: This wrapping paper will allow you to create a beautiful gift package. You just need to decide who to give it to!

name: Affection Wrapping Paper
description: This wrapping paper will allow you to create a beautiful gift package. You just need to decide who to give it to!

name: Tenderness Wrapping Paper
description: This wrapping paper will allow you to create a beautiful gift package. You just need to decide who to give it to!

name: Super Croquette
description: Your pets will absolutely love this extra-nutritious kibble.

name: Ivory Dofus Replica
description: Rotceres have flooded the market with thousands of these replicas, so don't expect this one to fetch a good price.

name: Ochre Dofus Replica
description: Rotceres have flooded the market with thousands of these replicas, so don't expect this one to fetch a good price.

name: Agi Ko Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one a bit more agile.

name: Ini Tra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one a bit more of an instigator.

name: Balanced Handle
description: Despite everything you've just done to it, this perfectly balanced handle is extremely well adjusted.

name: White Dofus
description: A Dofus without any personality.

name: Red Paint
description: What's wrong with seeing red?

name: Wonderful Astral Rune
description: When Twelvians' dreams come together, dreamlike thoughts crystallise and form an astral rune. Heroes often draw crowds, who in return dream of their exploits, thus creating wonderful astral runes.

name: Infinite Reflection
description: To understand the infinite nature of this reflection, just look for a few seconds into its astral patterns, so rich in age-old adventures.

name: Katana Handle
description: Crafted with care by Anatakwa. Maybe she was afraid of how long it would have taken if she had let you do the work.

name: Sesame Seed
description: Extremely rich in protein, this seed is a choice ingredient in the making of tasty bread, but the cultivation of sesame is rather delicate in the Amaknian climate. As a result, it is very rare and expensive.

name: Ash Wood
description: Ash Wood is a low-quality wood but it is very common - it grows fast too.

name: Ash Plank
description: A handyman could use this plank to make something delightful - a coffin, for example. Just bear that in mind.

name: Flax Flour
description: This flour is very strange. It's not made of grain, which explains why it doesn't look like flour. It also explains why it doesn't taste, smell or behave like flour.

name: Mouse Hair
description: This Mouse Hair is very thin and soft - a much sought-after resource in the making of expensive coats for the mistresses of rich Amaknian bankers.

name: Carved Bone
description: It's a fearsome and gloomy item. Once worked it's as dangerous as a Sram.

name: Enigmatic Kama
description: A Tofu head with a strange Tofu hat on decorates this kama.

name: Slender Tube
description: This tube has been specially designed to be uncorked with just one hand.

name: Strange Symbol
description: It's really difficult to explain what this playing card represents. It's important, though.

name: Cha Rune
description: This small rune can make the most attractive of weapons more attractive.

name: Metaria Sphere
description: This sphere is a perfect imitation of a Metaria's insulating membrane.

name: Gutted Igloo Fish
description: This Igloo Fish can now be used as an ingredient.

name: Onion
description: It's not just a good excuse for crying in public, this little bulb is also great for cooking.

name: Temporal Powder
description: This temporal powder, a flour residue discovered by Xelor millers, can slow down the molecular decomposition of materials and even living things. It is above all used as anti-wrinkle cream by female Enutrofs.

name: Sweet Barley Flour
description: Sweet Barley flour produces very light bread, so light in fact that it could be blown away by a gust of wind. That's no excuse to pig out on it though, OK?

name: Watermelon
description: Unlike the Lolwut Pear, the Lol Wutermelon is made of fail.

name: Fairywork Powder
description: When your guests get bored, crack open a box of Fairyworks! You can build them yourself using this powder and other ingredients. Guaranteed to create an explosive atmosphere at your next party.

name: Stuffed Iop Dopple
description:
This stuffed toy looks just like a real Iop in a way: too stupid for words and not even a smidgen of stuffing in its head.
(This stuffed toy is only good as a collector's item.)

name: Stuffed Osamodas Dopple
description:
They say that this toy can summon other small stuffed toys if it's kept in proper condition… but that's just an old wives' tale to keep young Osamodas from eating it.
(This stuffed toy is only good as a collector's item.)

name: Stuffed Tofu
description:
Who has never dreamt of cuddling a Tofu close? You maybe? In this case, you really do buy just anything, or your friends have no taste when it comes to gifts.
(This stuffed toy is only good as a collector's item.)

name: Stuffed Wabbit
description:
The stuffed Wabbit is a must-have, perhaps because it will never go out of fashion. Unlike you.
(This stuffed toy is only good as a collector's item.)

name: Blue Balloon
description: This balloon is a souvenir from the Trool Fair.

name: Jellidice Jelly
description: This jelly pot contains some repulsive-smelling substance with an appalling taste, and yet you secretly dream to spread it all over your body, don't you. Your perversion is even greater than your gluttony.

name: Sram Skull
description: This trophy was already morbid before it became a trophy.

name: Xelor Skull
description: This skull is often mistaken for that of the famous mummy Toothan Khumin. But don't be fooled, those bandages aren't made from molten kamas, but from paper mache.

name: Ecaflip Skull
description: That's enough of heads or tails. How about a game of knucklebones instead!

name: Earthstone
description: This stone is elemental energy, solidified and concentrated.

name: Apology Wrapping Paper
description: This wrapping paper will allow you to create a beautiful gift package. You just need to decide who to give it to!

name: Friendship Wrapping Paper
description: This wrapping paper will allow you to create a beautiful gift package. You just need to decide who to give it to!

name: Fellowship Wrapping Paper
description: This wrapping paper will allow you to create a beautiful gift package. You just need to decide who to give it to!

name: Minor Dynamo
description: Better hope you can hit a moving target…

name: Brakarina Hormone
description: This dehydrated growth hormone can be used to make a powerful potion which will improve the characteristics of a Brakarina.

name: Crimson Dofus Replica
description: Rotceres have flooded the market with thousands of these replicas, so don't expect this one to fetch a good price.

name: Forgotten Reflection
description:
Far beneath the veiled surface of this astral fragment, you can spot the brightness of a dreamlike memory. An epic and unique adventure in a land devoid of meaning. A volcanic reptile leading an infinite race.
It's time to wake up and forget again.

name: Int Tra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one a bit more intelligent.

name: Cha Ko Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes on a bit luckier.

name: Pod Tra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one a bit more grabby.

name: Improved Blibli Wax
description: This wax is much denser than typical wax. It is also more lasting. Thanks to these qualities, it makes an excellent base for candle production.

name: Pearl Onions
description: These perfectly prepared pearl onions will make all your dishes almost perfect.

name: Foam Blade
description: At this stage of production, you can use this blade to trim your shrubs or scrub your dirty dishes.

name: Immaculate Met'Axe
description: This axe is still too pure to be used as is.

name: Black Paint
description: Perfect for representing night, coal, or sin.

name: Marvellous Astral Rune
description: When Twelvians' dreams come together, dreamlike thoughts crystallise and form an astral rune. Demonstrations of love are the source of many a dream, and one of them has created this marvellous rune.

name: Dream Reflection
description: When you dream, you sometimes remember who you are… but when you wake, you forget, time and again. Gaze deeply into this reflection to remember what really matters.

name: Rock Dust
description: Don't go anywhere near this if you suffer from allergies.

name: Spirit Bamboo Branch
description: A branch from the last spirit bamboo of Plantala. An extinct plant species originally from the Astral Plane, fiercely guarded by a powerful Yokai called Shinotake.

name: Sesame Oil
description: Sesame Oil is obtained from Sesame Seeds and can be distinguished from the others by its rich and delicate taste... toasted Hazelnuts I would say. The only problem is that it smells like grilled Gobball.

name: Oat Flour
description: This flour doesn't rise during baking, which makes for a very dense bread, ideal for when you have to sock a monster on the loaf.

name: Potatoes
description: Generally speaking, when you come across a spud, it means that you either are in the middle of a field or in the depths of a dungeon.

name: Broken Helmet
description: This helmet took a bullet for you, pal.

name: Bloody Flint
description: This resistant and sharpened stone has apparently been used against something or someone. It is a raw and dangerous item which perfectly illustrates the characteristics of a Iop.

name: Vervain
description: This special plant helps people go to sleep. It must be the emblem of Sadida.

name: Big Phial
description: A thoughtfully-conceived phial which can be uncorked with no hands.

name: 2,000 Kek Coupon
description:
Something is written on this piece of paper:
"Congratulations! You are now the proud owner of a KeK coupon, which proves that you are a great adventurer. Come see us, we are waiting for you!"
Map coordinates -1,-2

name: 10,000 Kek Coupon
description:
Something is written on this piece of paper:
"Congratulations! You are now the proud owner of a KeK coupon, which proves that you are a great adventurer. Come see us, we are waiting for you!"
Map coordinates -1,-2

name: Stre Rune
