description: This small rune can make the sharpest blades even sharper.

name: Int Rune
description: This small rune can make the brightest weapons brighter.

name: Red Metaria
description: This strange-looking sphere seems to contain a tiny flame in its centre.

name: Yellow Metaria
description: This strange-looking sphere seems to contain a clump of dirt in its centre.

name: Green Metaria
description: This strange-looking sphere seems to contain a tiny breeze in its centre.

name: Blue Triam Metaria
description: This strange-looking sphere seems to contain a tiny lake in its centre.

name: Blue Mage Metaria
description: This strange-looking sphere seems to contain a tiny ocean in its centre.

name: Yellow Mage Metaria
description: This strange-looking sphere seems to contain a tiny mountain in its centre.

name: Salt Measure
description: This salt measure is the ideal quantity to season most family dishes. No meal can be cooked without it.

name: Gutted Exotic Crab Surimi
description: This Exotic Crab Surimi can now be used as an ingredient.

name: Gutted Tigerfish
description: This Tigerfish can now be used as an ingredient.

name: Gutted Grawn
description: This Grawn can now be used as an ingredient.

name: Gutted Gudgeon
description: This Gudgeon can now be used as an ingredient.

name: Kiye Gudgeon
description: This rare species of gudgeon comes from Kiye Island, off Moon Island. Accustomed to warm currents, it migrates once a year to a hotter clime.

name: Gold-Bearing Oat Flour
description: This flour was obtained using Gold-bearing Oats which impart their soft golden colour and considerable magical powers. They won't make a baker-wizard of you, though.

name: Hestia's Bramble Leaf
description: This ordinary-looking bramble leaf is an essential plant for some strange recipes.

name: Liquid Metal Potion
description: This potion gives a little reality back to an ethereal blade.

name: Stuffed Gobball
description:
This stuffed toy is the spitting image of a Gobball; and its creators were vicious enough to make it smell like Gobball too. So don't be surprised if you smell bad when you wake up in the morning.
(This stuffed toy is only good as a collector's item.)

name: Stuffed Boar
description:
Real boar bristles were used to make this toy. Surely that's a sign of quality.
(This stuffed toy is only good as a collector's item.)

name: Stuffed Mush Mush
description:
This Mush Mush has neither painful thorns nor paralysing poison. But it's fearsome enough to frighten the most naive of Iops.
(This stuffed toy is only good as a collector's item.)

name: Fire Pandawushu Artefact
description: This magic artefact is used by the Pandawushu disciples to enchant their equipment.

name: Pod Rune
description: This rune will make equipment lighter.

name: Kaliptus Leaf
description: Delicately inserted in nostrils, these leaves will unblock any nose. Some tribal legends even say that this technique works for other orifices.

name: Kaliptus Flower
description: When you burn it, this flower gives off a thick hallucinogenic smoke. When you chew it, it tends to make you impotent. And if you use it to make an infusion, it will have great laxative effects. The best thing to do would be not to touch it at all.

name: Game Master Token
description: You can probably exchange this beautiful token for precious gifts at the Trool Fair.

name: Industrial Fattrool
description: You can use this thick and nutritious grease to cook most types of food in old pots without ruining the dish. Some Osamodas also use it to slip Tofus into places that the Iop moral code condemns.

name: Osamodas Skull
description: A Tofu here, a Bwork Magus there… This Osamodas disciple just lost his head!

name: Pandawa Skull
description: You'd have thought that after being hung-over for such a long period of time, this Pandawa would have appreciated being placed in a coffin!

name: Hazing Stone
description: Trampled, chewed, crushed, washed, ironed, dried, you've had everything done to you. Not only is your body bruised, but your ego too.

name: Masqueraider Skull
description: Since you can't use his mask, which refuses to come off, this Masqueraider skull can be worn as a hat. Unfortunately though, it also comes with a very bad smell which you can't get rid of.

name: Billabone Cemetery Relic
description: Imbued with a powerful magic, each extremity of this relic shows the opposite direction to the other. So, it can tell you where the north and south are, or the east and west, simply by pointing the relic in the right direction. Now you think about, that salesman ripped you off, didn't he? What do you expect from a souvenir shop, though?

name: Snowflake
description: This magical snowflake is a vital resource for crafting Kwismas items. Unfortunately, if you try to use it to cool down your suitors' enthusiasm it'll have no effect at all.

name: Birthday Wrapping Paper
description: This wrapping paper will allow you to create a beautiful gift package. You just need to decide who to give it to!

name: Love Wrapping Paper
description: This wrapping paper will allow you to create a beautiful gift package. You just need to decide who to give it to!

name: Nugget
description: It glitters like your sweetheart's eyes, and crackles as a sausage upon a grill.

name: Eliotrope Skull
description: The crafters don't yet know enough about this item for its characteristics to be revealed to potential buyers.

name: Nettle Hyroid
description: You just have to rub these leaves on your enemies face to hear them sing louder than a eunuch.

name: Particle Board
description: This board is used to create cheap furniture, which is why it's prized by Enutrofs working in funeral parlours.

name: Chimeric Feather
description: Trying to get a feather from the Chimeric Tofu by running after it will build up your legs real quick!

name: Raspberry
description: A sweet red fruit that children and the goddess of seagulls love.

name: Int Ko Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one a bit more intelligent.

name: Stre Ko Rune
description: An unending nightmare rune that makes one a bit stronger.

name: Agi Tra Rune
description: An eternal dream rune that makes one a bit more agile.

name: Golden Snowflake
description: Without this golden snowflake, no crafter could make any element of the Hairy set.

name: Hairy Pattern
description: This pattern can be used by craftsmen to make part of the Hairy set.

name: Met'Axe
description:
"Anatomically speaking, this axe isn't particularly dangerous, and rightly so: the aim of such a tool isn't to injure. But don't rush to judgement too quickly: this axe could spill a lot of ink if used improperly."
- Roger D, professional nerfer

name: Yellow Paint
description: I wrote a song for you and all the things you do…

name: Orange Paint
description: Orange you glad to see me?

name: Average Astral Rune
description: When Twelvians' dreams come together, dreamlike thoughts crystallise and form an astral rune. It's not unusual for more than one soul to dream of similar adventures on the same night. These coincidences are the source of astral runes such as this one that you have in your hand.

name: Major Astral Rune
description: When Twelvians' dreams come together, dreamlike thoughts crystallise and form an astral rune. Selfless acts don't always spread throughout the ages, but their impact greatly inspires a few souls. Their dreams crystallise into an astral rune such as this one.

name: Het Dawa Blood Sample
description: A sample of Het Dawa's blood. You have a little piece of him in you – how sweet… well, not really.

name: Wood Pandawushu Artefact
description: This magic artefact is used by the Pandawushu disciples to enchant their equipment.
